"sabak bernam 27 feb kisahnya umpama hidup segan mati tak mahu disebabkan permintaan merosot kini hanya tinggal 10 orang sahaja pemandu teksi di daerah ini yang masih lagi mengharapkan pekerjaan tersebut untuk menyara keluarga lebih menyedihkan sejak bertukar tampuk pentadbiran negara hidup 10 pemandu teksi sabak bernam itu semakin perit kerana tiada lagi bantuan rm800 baucar tayar dan subsidi minyak seperti sebelum ini seorang pemandu teksi v kanippan 72 berkata keadaan sekarang jauh berbeza berbanding empat tahun lalu yang bukan sahaja pemandu teksi masih ramai tetapi saingan daripada uber pun tiada pendapatan sebagai pemandu teksi memang tidak menentu purata sehari antara rm50 hingga rm70 namun ada kalanya langsung tiada pelanggan dengan pendapatan tidak seberapa inilah saya peruntukkan untuk perbelanjaan harian keluarga dan bagi menampung kos penyelenggaraan teksi katanya sementara itu seorang lagi pemandu teksi mohd zaini roslan 65 berkata pendapatan yang tidak menentu menyebabkan kerjaya itu tidak menjadi pilihan dalam seminggu adalah sekali atau dua dapat hantar pelanggan ke luar daerah ini seperti ke kuala lumpur jadi dapatlah rm200 untuk satu perjalanan katanya tambah mohd zaini antara punca jumlah pendapatan pemandu teksi merosot adalah disebabkan pelanggan ketika ini mempunyai pilihan untuk menggunakan perkhidmatan awam lain seperti bas percuma yang disediakan kerajaan negeri menyentuh beberapa bantuan yang diterima pemandu teksi semasa pemerintahan kerajaan barisan nasional bn sebelum ini mohd zaini berharap agar kerajaan pakatan harapan ph meneruskan perkara itu saya sendiri pernah menerima bantuan rm800 baucar tayar serta subsidi minyak dan berharap ia diteruskan bagi meringankan beban pemandu teksi katanya"
hmetro20190331penuntut utm menang anugerah menteri pendidikanhttpswwwhmetrocommymutakhir201903439449penuntututmmenanganugerahmenteripendidikan penuntut universiti teknologi malaysia utm muhammad syafiq rahmat 24 ditabalkan sebagai penerima anugerah menteri pendidikan sekali gus bergelar tokoh siswa kebangsaan pada anugerah tokoh siswa 2018 di universiti sains islam malaysia usim malam tadi terdahulu anak jati kempas johor bahru itu memenangi anugerah pemimpin program sukan yang membolehkannya memenangi anugerah utama disampaikan menteri pendidikan dr maszlee malik penuntut tahun akhir ijazah sarjana muda sains komputer rangkaian keselamatan komputer itu ditabalkan pemenang sebaik menampilkan kepimpinan sebagai presiden mahasiswa johor dengan menganjurkan global outreach programme gop europe iaitu di london paris amsterdam dan milan dia menerima rm3000 trofi dan sijil turut menganjurkan program sama di shanghai dan beijing china selain pernah memenangi anugerah pemimpin program sukan terbaik 2018 anjuran universiti anugerah sukarelawan pembangunan belia dan anugerah naib canselor muhammad syafiq berkata program anjuran kementerian pendidikan malaysia kpm adalah medium terbaik menghargai sumbangan mahasiswa sepanjang berada di kampus kementerian mengiktiraf mahasiswa menerusi 15 kategori dipertandingkan bagi saya anugerah ini amanah yang memberi inspirasi kepada mahasiswa untuk berkhidmat pada masyarakat katanya menurutnya mahasiswa adalah aset penting negara yang bakal merencanakan kepimpinan suatu hari nanti dan bermula saat ini perlu menawarkan apa yang terdaya sekalung penghargaan buat ibu bapa menteri pendidikan pihak universiti dan sahabat yang memberikan sokongan atas kejayaan ini katanya ketika berucap maszlee berkata pemilihan pemenang mengambil kira pembabitan mahasiswa dalam program pencapaian akademik dan sahsiah diri selaras aspirasi kpm untuk melahirkan insan yang holistik penganugerahan ini mampu menjadi wadah kepada mahasiswa untuk menonjolkan sifat kepimpinan serta bergiat lebih aktif dalam pelbagai aktiviti katanya pada program itu anugerah pemimpin majlis perwakilan pelajar menjadi milik penuntut universiti antarabangsa malaysia uiam afifah abdul shukor anugerah pemimpin kolej kediaman mohd aswan mohd amin unisza anugerah pemimpin fakulti persatuan kelab amir firdaus eddy rosyadie universiti malaya anugerah pemimpin badan beruniform nur najjah abd manas usm anugerah pemimpin program keusahawanan muhammad ziyad mohd yazid unisza dan anugerah pemimpin program kebudayaan jerry yacob anugerah pemimpin program sains teknologi dan inovasi dimenangi muhammad nurfiqri mohd hajar unimap anugerah pemimpin program pengucapan awam nur adibah ahmad zamri upsi anugerah pemimpin wacana intelek abdul kadir shah sahibudeen um anugerah pemimpin pelajar antarabangsa aditya hutama iswardi upm anugerah pemimpin kesejahteraan komuniti mohd haffis teh ukm anugerah pemimpin alam sekitar tan chun tat ukm anugerah pemimpin sukarelawan terbuka muhammad irsyad zaini um dan anugerah pasukan sukarelawan terbaik umission club uiam semua pemenang menerima rm1000 trofi biasiswa tokoh siswa dan sijil yang disampaikan timbalan menteri pendidikan teo nie ching sebagai tuan rumah usim tidak pulang dengan tangan kosong apabila membawa pulang dua anugerah khas ketua pengarah pendidikan tinggi membabitkan pasukan debat bahasa arab dan individu muhammad syafiq suhaimi selaku johan pidato dwibahasa ihtifal asean hadir sama ke program itu timbalan ketua setiausaha kpm datuk kamel mohamad ketua pengarah pendidikan tinggi datin paduka ir dr siti hamisah tapsir dan ketua pengarah jabatan pendidikan politeknik dan kolej komuniti profesor datuk dr mohd ismail abd aziz15453sosioekonomimasyarakat

"kuala lumpur 30 april bernama pendirian malaysia dalam memperjuang nasib rakyat palestin adalah konsisten dan pendirian malaysia terhadap israel masih tidak berubah iaitu tiada sebarang hubungan diplomatik antara keduadua negara kata timbalan menteri luar datuk marzuki yahya beliau sekali gus menegaskan bahawa kerajaan tidak akan sama sekali mempertimbang untuk membuka kedutaan besar malaysia di israel selagi konflik antara palestin dan israel tidak diselesaikan rfpinfeeddefaultrunimmediatelytrue malaysia tidak akan berkompromi selagi penindasan ke atas rakyat palestin masih berterusan dan tiada keikhlasan di pihak israel untuk mencari penyelesaian saksama berhubung konflik israel dengan palestin katanya ketika menggulung perbahasan titah diraja pada persidangan dewan negara bagi kementeriannya hari ini tegasnya malaysia komited dalam memberi sokongan kepada palestin untuk menubuhkan sebuah negara yang merdeka dan berdaulat kerajaan sentiasa memberi sokongan padu kepada palestin dan rakyatnya baik dari segi politik ekonomi dan moral malah turut memberi bantuan berbentuk kemanusiaan sumbangan kewangan serta sumbangan untuk pembangunan infrastruktur asas dan pembangunan kapasiti sama ada secara langsung mahupun melalui pertubuhan antarabangsa dan badan bukan kerajaan tambahnya bernama"

"kuala lumpur oct 31 the case management for former prime minister datuk seri najib razaks two cases involving misappropriation of funds linked to 1mdb and its former unit src international sdn bhd have been extended to nov 29 this was decided by high court judge mohd nazlan mohd ghazali after he allowed najibs application for one of the cases comprising 25 charges related to the the transfer of rm23 billion through the expremiers personal account to be transferred from the sessions court to the high court in allowing the transfer justice nazlan said he took into consideration the high public interest revolving the case and the high value involved as well as the fact that the other case comprising seven charges involving rm42 million in src international has also been transferred to the high court from the sessions court previously on a related matter chief judge of malaya tan sri zaharah ibrahim has yet to give a decision on the request by the prosecution led by former malaysian bar president datuk sulaiman abdullah for the two cases to be heard in putrajaya instead of kuala lumpur tan sri muhammad shafee abdullah the lead defence counsel for najib told the high court today that he had submitted a letter to zaharah opposing sulaimans request zaharah is not restricted to any timeline to decide on the matter a lawyer said on another matter justice nazlan allowed muhammad shafee to file an application to compel sulaiman to show the court and the defence team the fiat appointing him as a deputy public prosecutor that was issued to him by the attorneygenerals chambers by nov 5 sulaiman meanwhile confirmed that the prosecution and defence met at a pretrial conference on oct 29 and both are in the midst of finalising documents in relation to the cases as the defence has obtained all documents from the prosecution to fulfill section 51a of the criminal procedure code muhammad shafee is now due to pass to the prosecution the defence statement and copies of documents that the defence intends to rely on under section 62 of the macc act the provision requires the defense to provide a defense statement prior to a trial justice nazlan instructed the prosecution and defence to submit their written submissions each summarizing relevant facts laws and proposed analyses by nov 27 two days before the next case management najib 65 was in court today accompanied by his spouse datin seri rosmah mansor while being surrounded by police escorts and his supporters outside the court muhammad shafee said he supported a suggestion by reporters that najibs trials be aired live on television i think it is a good idea let the people know what the trial is all about he said"
"kuala lumpur 31 dis suruhanjaya pencegahan rasuah malaysia sprm sedang menyiasat laporan mengenai tiga anggota polis yang mendakwa mereka diserang pegawai sprm ketika hadir memberi keterangan berhubung kes pemerasan ketua pesuruhjaya sprm latheefa koya berkata dakwaan itu akan diteliti secara serius dan kerjasama penuh diberikan kepada polis berhubung laporan berkenaan tiada toleransi bagi apa jenis serangan dalam tahanan katanya dalam kenyataan pada isnin beliau memaklumkan satu laporan polis juga telah dibuat oleh pegawai sprm terbabit yang menyatakan bahawa tuduhan serangan dalam tahanan itu adalah palsu latheefa menegaskan sprm meletakkan prosedur operasi standard sop yang ketat untuk menangkap dan menahan suspek jelasnya dalam kes penahanan itu anggota polis terbabit sedang disiasat sprm atas dakwaan melakukan pemerasan terhadap suspek penyalahgunaan dadah katanya ia merupakan sebahagian daripada peningkatan operasi oleh sprm selangor susulan dakwaan kegiatan pemerasan yang melibatkan anggota polis tiga anggota bahagian siasatan jenayah narkotik ibu pejabat polis daerah sungai buloh berumur 24 25 dan 26 tahun sebelum ini membuat laporan polis mendakwa mereka ditumbuk ditampar serta ditendang ketika proses mengambil keterangan oleh pegawai sprm dalam sebuah bilik di pejabat sprm selangor di shah alam pada 24 dan 26 dis lepas bernama tweets by theairtimesdsidvar jsfjsdgetelementsbytagnames0phttptestdlocationhttphttpsifdgetelementbyididjsdcreateelementsjsididjssrcpplatformtwittercomwidgetsjsfjsparentnodeinsertbeforejsfjsdocumentscripttwitterwjs air times news network adalah sebuah sebuah syarikat media atas talian yang bertemakan kestabilan sosial dan politik asas pertahanan serta keamanan negara 2019 airtimesmy all right reserved website design services by web designer kl"
"sorry maaf abang sorry maaf abang kata wanita warga indonesia dalam keadaan melutut merayu kemaafan daripada suaminya tindakan wanita terbabit merayu suaminya dipercayai disebabkan gagal meloloskan diri mendapat perhatian anggota jabatan imigresen malaysia jim selepas pasangan suami isteri itu ditahan dalam operasi di seksyen 16 persiaran puncak alam 6 bandar puncak alam shah alam terdahulu pasangan terbabit dilapor cuba melarikan diri dengan memanjat bukit berhampiran penempatan haram yang dihuni mereka namun gagal timbalan penolong pengarah imigresen kanan mohamad rahmat abdul manap yang mengetuai operasi berkata keduadua mereka ditahan kerana tiada pas perjalanan sah malah masuk ke negara ini secara haram melalui perairan johor pasangan ini antara 22 pendatang asing tanpa izin pati ditahan termasuk seorang bayi perempuan di lokasi kedua operasi bersepadu bersama jabatan pendaftaran negara jpn pagi ini seramai 113 pati yang diperiksa di kawasan penempatan ini katanya pada sidang media selepas operasi operasi bermula jam 12 tengah malam sehingga 330 pagi itu membabitkan seramai 66 pegawai dan anggota keduadua jabatan beliau berkata serbuan itu dilakukan hasil risikan selama dua minggu selepas mendapati terdapat sebuah penempatan haram yang besar di kawasan itu dianggarkan terdapat lebih 200 pintu dengan pelbagai saiz rumah membabitkan dua blok serta lengkap dengan surau dan kedai runcit untuk kemudahan mereka kami percaya penempatan ini bermula sebagai rumah kongsi pekerja binaan lama kelamaan menjadi penempatan yang besar dan kami akan siasat untuk mengesan siapa pemilik sebenar tanah ini katanya dalam satu operasi lain mohamad rahmat berkata seramai 22 pati juga ditahan di lokasi pertama serbuan iaitu di sebuah kilang pembuatan alat ganti kenderaan di seksyen 26 di shah alam jadi jumlah keseluruhan ditahan di dua lokasi ini adalah 44 orang membabitkan 33 lelaki dan 11 perempuan terdiri daripada warga bangladesh pakistan india nepal indonesia dan myanmar dengan lingkungan usia antara tiga bulan sehingga 60 tahun semua yang ditahan melakukan kesalahan mengikut seksyen 61c akta imigresen 195963 iaitu tinggal tanpa pas atau permit yang sah dan seksyen 151c akta sama kerana tinggal lebih masa mereka akan dibawa ke bahagian penguatkuasaan imigresen di shah alam sebelum dihantar ke depoh tahanan imigresen semenyih untuk tujuan siasatan dan pendakwaan katanya"

"datuk lew choon lai one of the witnesses in najibs src trial photo by kenny yap kuala lumpur april 30 a property developercumevent organiser who said he was a strong believer in former premier datuk seri najib razaks 1malaysia racial unity programme said he received a cheque from the latter to pay for goodies distributed at one ground event to promote the programme datuk lew choon lai the owner for solar shine sdn bhd told the high court he is a smalltime property developer and solar shine is an event organising firm that distributes food and other items to the indian community and holds dinners and chinese events at rural areas the witness says solar shine would coordinate with bn to organise dinners and lucky draws he volunteered to hold these events as he wanted to promote the 1malaysia policy which was najibs pet project to promote national unity among the races i am a strong believer of 1malaysia he said lew 60 says he met najib in 2015 when he volunteered to undertake ground campaigns among the indians and senior chinese citizens all over the country i initially met najib through tan sri william cheng of lion group i met najib on the fifth floor of pmo prime ministers office to discuss chineserelated problems he said he admitted to receiving the rm1 million cheque personally from the expremier to pay for items distributed during an event lew said he met najib for a short while several months later in 2015 to relate the feeling on the ground the ground campaign was stopped after the 14th general election we were devastated about the fall of najib as prime minister he said related ags chambers seeks to defer 1mdb trial until src case completes najibsrc trial nobody gives information for free says witness who received rm25m cheque from expm najibsrc trial srcs exceo could not take funds without najibs consent"

umnoonline20190531ag harus berkredibiliti inkues adib seolah ada agenda belakang tabirhttpsumnoonlinemy20190531agharusberkredibilitiinkuesadibseolahadaagendabelakangtabirumno online laman berita rasmi pertubuhan kebangsaan melayu bersatu atau umno kuala lumpur 31 mei ahli majlis tertinggi umno datuk seri bung moktar radin menegaskan institusi peguam negara seharusnya berkredibiliti tinggi dan tidak wajar dinampakkan dipengaruhi oleh manamana pihak dalam inkues kematian anggota bomba muhammad adib mohd kassim yang maut semasa bertugas ketika rusuhan di kuil sri maha mariamman seafield tahun lalu katanya tindakan tommy thomas campur tangan dalam fasa demi fasa prosiding awal kes ini memberi gambaran seolaholah ada agenda belakang tabir sedang berlaku yang menjadi tanda tanya umum tommy adalah peguam negara pertama di bawah kerajaan malaysia baru dan imej baru yang sepatutnya dibawa oleh beliau adalah membiarkan ketelusan undang undang menentukan proses hala tuju kes adib bukannya cuba menjatuhkan hukuman awal kepada kes ini melalui permohonan afidavit serta arahan pertukaran peguam katanya dalam kenyataan hari ini bidas beliau yang juga ahli parlimen kinabatangan satu demi satu percanggahan tindakan yang berlaku seolaholah memperlihatkan ada sesuatu yang mahu disembunyikan dan jika benar ini berlaku apakah ia baik untuk imej jabatan peguam negara inikah wajah perundangan negara di bawah malaysia baru tommy harus sedar bahawa tragedi kematian adib sejak awal lagi adalah satu kes sensitif sehingga menyebabkan beberapa badan bukan kerajaan bertindak menyerahkan memorandum kepada kerajaan supaya seorang menteri dan seorang timbalan menteri dipecat kerana dilihat menyebelahi pengurusan kuil katanya jika tidak diurus dengan baik ia boleh berubah menjadi isu rasis di atas senario ini jika tommy sendiri dilihat bias atau melakukan sesuatu tindakan yang prejudis kepada kes adalah tidak relevan untuk kes ini dikendalikan oleh tommy atau pasukan tommy dan sebaiknya diurus oleh suruhanjaya siasatan diraja rci tegas beliau sudah terlalu lama kes ini tergantung keputusannya harus diingat adib tidak minta kematiannya jadi sebegini dia seorang anggota bomba yang baik dan ke tempat kejadian dengan niat mahu memadamkan api menyelamatkan nyawa dan membantu mangsa kebakaran di sebuah kuil kenapa kita yang masih hidup ini menyulitkan proses keadilan untuk "lumut the handover of the royal malaysian navy rmns first littoral combat ship lcs kd maharaja lela that was initially scheduled for next year has now been postponed to a later date this was due to its builder the boustead naval shipyard a subsidiary company of boustead heavy industries corporation berhad bhic was still waiting for an important component from a company in the united states to enhance the ships performance bhic managing director tan sri ahmad ramli mohd nor said the component was expected to arrive by end of next year following this development kd maharaja lela would not be involved in the langkawi international maritime and aerospace 2019 lima 2019 exhibition scheduled for march next year he said the system that controls the engines and generators supplied by other company is already in place but we want to enhance it and this has caused the delay and we will ensure that it will run smoothly he said this in a news conference after the keel laying ceremony of the 4th lcs officiated by deputy defence minister senator liew chin tong at bns dockyard here today he said the delay was normal as kd maharaja lela was the rmn first lcs of frigate class and there were various improvements needed when we deliver this ship it is not just the physical ship but its entire system and we have to keep experimenting for a long time sometimes of up to one year he said the kd maharaja lela is among the six coastal combat ships fully built by bns in rm9 billion project to be delivered in stages to rmn with the final delivery of the sixth lcs scheduled for 2023 all six lcs ships have four dimensions combat capacity with the durability to overcome electronic surface submersible and air threats and possesses the latest in combat management systems and capable of accommodating up to 118 crew members bernama exclusive stories"
thesundaily20190331kg pasir airport residents grateful to dr streram for bus stophttpswwwthesundailymylocalkgpasirairportresidentsgratefultodrstreramforbusstopcl739114seremban more than 20 families residing in kampung pasir airport here are relieved and grateful when the request for a bus stop in the village was realised with the help of pakatan harapan ph after a 15year long wait it was heard by the ph candidate dr s streram who managed to get the busstop completed within two weeks by advancing rm8000 of his own money nicholas 56 who has been living in the village since 1985 was moved by strerams action to help the residents of kampung pasir airport considered one of the minorities in the rantau region he said the bus stop measuring 10 x 12 feet roofed and blue in colour not only connected residents with public transport but also provided shelter for children waiting for the school bus when it rained imagine the nearest bus stop to our village is at a distance of about 12km weve made the request many times but in vain he told bernama today another resident u karunash 36 expressed regret over the demands of the people being ignored by the previous government he asked whether this was because the population the vast majority of whom belonged to the lowincome group and lived in oil palm estates was the reason for ignoring their request people here are not rich and there are families relying heavily on the bus to go to town never mind we do not want to complain about the old government what is important is that we are grateful to those who are willing to listen to our voices he said streram said phs founding principle which was always to champion the peoples cause was his guiding principle for us as a responsible party ph we look after the welfare of the people although it is a small request but it makes a big difference so that everybody can enjoy the fruits of the ph government he said streram who is the rembau pkr division deputy chief said that if the people of rantau want a change the power was always in their hands the rantau state assembly byelection on april 13 will see a fourcornered fight between streram datuk seri mohamad hasan who is also umno deputy president and two independent candidates r malarvizhi and mohd nor yassin bernama 46050 petaling jaya selangor malaysia tel 6037784 6688 fax 6037785 2624 6037785 2625374politikpakatan harapan
malaysiadateline20190902hargai keamanan kesejahteraan negara kata pimpinan phhttpsmalaysiadatelinecomhargaikeamanankesejahteraannegarakatapimpinanph adsbygoogle windowadsbygoogle push rakyat malaysia digesa bersamasama menghargai keamanan dan kesejahteraan yang telah dinikmati selama ini dengan mendidik diri dan keluarga serta jiran tetangga supaya saling memahami bertoleransi dan melayani satu sama lain majlis presiden pakatan harapan ph dalam satu kenyataan sempena sambutan hari kebangsaan ke62 hari ini turut menggesa seluruh rakyat untuk menjauhi sikap melampau yang cuba dicetuskan pihak yang hanya melakukannya demi kepentingan politik mereka menginsafi bahawa negara yang kita cintai sedang terus diasak sentimen perkauman walaupun sudah 62 tahun bebas daripada ancaman penjajah malaysia tidak mempunyai pilihan lain selain kembali ke garis tengah dan meninggalkan segala prasangka serta fahaman melampau yang mengancam kesinambungan kejayaan rakyat negara ini yang telah melaksanakan sebuah perubahan politik yang begitu besar pada 9 mei 2018 menurut kenyataan itu kenyataan itu dikeluarkan bersama oleh presiden pkr datuk seri anwar ibrahim presiden parti pribumi bersatu malaysia bersatu tan sri muhyiddin yassin setiausaha agung dap lim guan eng dan presiden parti amanah negara amanah mohamad sabu kepimpinan utama ph dalam kenyataan itu turut mengingatkan apa yang telah dikecapi negara selama ini boleh hilang sekelip mata sekiranya rakyat gagal menginsafi diri tentang pengorbanan dan kepayahan yang telah dilalui oleh mereka terdahulu pada tahun 1963 kita telah membentuk sebuah persekutuan bersamasama sabah dan sarawak dan kemudiannya malaysia muncul sebagai sebuah negara yang majmuk dan kaya dengan pelbagai budaya serta tradisi meskipun berbilang keturunan agama bahasa budaya dan adat resam kita tidak pernah lelah dalam usaha membina sebuah bangsa yang tetap bersatu padu menurt kenyataan itu bernama var dnew "dalam tempoh tidak sampai tiga tahun pengusaha kek ini yang pada waktu itu hanya beroperasi di rumah telah berjaya menembusi pasaran di pasar pasar raya besar hypermarket di seluruh negara tidak henti henti memanjat syukur kepada allah pasangan suami isteri zukahida kasim dan suami onnie zurin abu melihat keadaan yang amat menggalakkan itu sebagai satu kurniaan rezeki yang luar biasa setelah sebelum itu beberapa perniagaan yang ditubuhkan terpaksa ditutup kerana masalah pengurusan dan perlu memberi tumpuan kepada ibu bapa yang tidak sihat zukahida berkata sebagai isteri kepada suami yang berstatus anak tunggal sudah tentu tumpuannya lebih besar kepada keluarga dan mentua dalam masa yang sama suami pula tidak sihat terpaksa menjalani rawatan dan pembedahan membuatkan dia tidak mampu bekerja ketika orang orang yang disayangi tidak sihat zukahida perlu melepaskan tanggungjawab menguruskan kedai kedainya kerana mahu beri sepenuh tumpuan menjaga kedua dua mentua dan suami arwah ibu mentua maznah bahari adalah seorang yang sangat pandai membuat kek buah kukus kek buah kukus yang dibuatnya memang sering mendapat pujian kenalan dan rakan rakan ketika menjaga ibu mentua saya sempat belajar membuat kek kukus daripada dia kebetulan saya memang suka masak dan cubaan pertama membuat kek buah tidak sangka menjadi pula saya mengambil gambar dan memasukkannya ke dalam facebook agar kawan kawan yang mahu mencuba boleh membuat tempahan pada mulanya saya melakukannya sebagai hobi dan tidak sangka mendapat sambutan yang memberangsangkan daripada kenalan terdekat kek buah kukus memang rumit penyediaannya ia perlu dikukus selama empat jam agar tahan lebih lama dan sedap dengan karamel yang lazat setakat ini peminat kek memang menggemari kek kek keluaran syarikat ini terutama kek buah kukus jelasnya yang dikurniakan tiga orang cahaya mata kata zukahida suaminya mencuba membuat panggilan telefon kepada salah sebuah pasar raya iaitu aeon big mengenai kek buah kukus yang dihasilkan olehnya kebetulan ketika itu pihak pengurusan pasar raya berkenaan memerlukan kek berkenaan kerana bertepatan dengan perayaan krismas rentetan daripada itu kek buah kukus keluaran syarikat mereka kolam emas sdn bhd dengan jenama frutissimo semakin mendapat tempat dan sambutan dengan diedarkan ke sembilan lagi cawangan pasar raya yang sama di sekitar lembah klang pada seterusnya produk kek kukus buah ini berjaya pula menembusi pasar raya giant di seluruh negara dan mendapat permintaan yang memuaskan biarpun terdapat persaingan daripada pengedar pengedar kek lain selain kek buah kukus syarikat itu turut mengedarkan pelbagai jenis kek buah yang lembab kek coklat brownies marble dan sebagainya sementara itu onnie zurin berkata memandangkan permintaan kek kek keluaran syarikatnya semakin banyak pihaknya segera mencari sebuah premis yang boleh dijadikan sebagai kilang bagi pengeluaran dan pengedaran akhirnya pada april syarikat kolam emas yang pada mulanya hanya bermodalkan rm melangkah setapak lagi dengan mempunyai sebuah kilang sendiri di klang selangor setakat ini syarikat yang sepenuhnya diusahakan oleh orang melayu ini mempunyai pekerja tempatan selain dilengkapi peralatan moden seperti mesin adunan dan ketuhar kami juga mendapat sijil halal dengan pengeluaran dan pengedaran dalam jangka masa sebulan ialah tan iaitu bersamaan unit yang setiap satu seberat gram sehingga ini kami masih lagi meneruskan proses pembangunan dan penyelidikan r d agar kek kek yang dikeluarkan sentiasa dipertingkat kualitinya untuk bersaing dengan jenama kek lain di pasaran katanya yang turut memberitahu kek keknya juga boleh didapati di pasar raya lulu cold storage tesco petron petronas shell jasons food hall dan mercato d market place"

"the police army and rela personnel join forces to man road blocks in george town march 31 2020 picture by sayuti zainudingeorge town march 31 a total of 183 people were charged separately in penang today for breaching the movement control order mco enforced nationwide to contain the coronavirus disease covid19 dfpdisplayslot due to their numbers it took three separate magistrates courts nearly the entire day to process all the accused aged between 15 and 66 dfpdisplayslotmmstoryoutstream over in george town 33 people aged between 19 and 62 years old were charged under rule 31 prevention of control of infectious diseases measures within the infected local areas regulations 2020 of these eight claimed trial while 26 pleaded guilty and were sentenced to a rm1000 fine each and between one and two weeks imprisonment minors were let off with three months compulsory attendance orders dfpdisplayslotmmstorymreg2 most were arrested on march 27 and 28 for gathering in public two were arrested for jogging and cycling in public areas dfpdisplayslotmmteads one g rubenraj 19 was also charged with obstructing a civil servant from discharging their duties as he allegedly pushed and swore at the police at a roadblock along jalan sultan azlan shah he was sentenced to one months imprisonment and fined rm1000 after pleading guilty at the bukit mertajam court 77 people were charged with breaching the mco and all but one pleaded guilty from this group 53 were fined rm1000 each while the sentencing for two teenagers aged 16 and 17 years old will be delivered on may 14 pending their disciplinary reports the court also fixed may 14 for mention of the case involving another teenager who claimed trial another 21 people all foreigners did not enter their pleas as they did not understand the charges read out to them in malay the court fixed may 14 to arrange for interpreters to read out the charges to them in butterworth 73 people pleaded guilty to breaching the mco and received a rm1000 fine each some were variously sentenced to imprisonment and three months compulsory attendance orders all 183 were arrested between march 24 and 29 during roadblocks and several operations by the authorities to enforce the mco the mco was put in place on march 18 and later extended to april 14"

"pesawat bombardier cl415 milik agensi penguatkuasaan maritim malaysia apmm memulakan operasi membantu memadamkan kebakaran di hutan simpan kuala langat selatan hari ini pengarah maritim negeri maritim negeri selangor kapten maritim mohammad rosli kassim berkata operasi bantuan pemadaman kebakaran itu kaedah water bombing operasi pemadaman bermula pagi tadi di kawasan kebakaran yang dianggarkan seluas 50 hektar sejak 27 februari lalu bahagian operasi udara bou menghantar dua set pasukan penerbang yang terdiri dari juruterbang dan anak kapal bagi menyertai operasi pemadaman kebakaran itu operasi itu dijalankan dengan kerjasama bersama jabatan bomba dan penyelamat malaysia jbpm serta agensi lain seperti angkatan pertahanan awam dan skuad pantas oleh kerajaan negeri selangor katanya pada sidang media di stesen udara subang maritim hari ini hadir sama timbalan pengarah jbpm selangor penolong pesuruhjaya bomba wan md razali wan ismail dan juruterbang pesawat terbabit komander maritim salihin hamzah mohammad rosli berkata operasi itu dikoordinasi oleh ibu pejabat maritim negeri selangor dengan kerjasama bou dari ibu pejabat maritim malaysia di putrajaya apmm menyasarkan sekurangkurangnya dua sortie dua penerbangan setiap hari yang mana akan memakan masa kirakira empat jam bagi setiap sortie hari ini sebanyak tiga sortie dijalankan dua sortie di sebelah pagi dan satu sortie di sebelah petang katanya beliau berkata pesawat itu mampu membawa kirakira 6000 liter air bagi setiap kali water scooping di mana setiap kali water scooping mengambil masa hanya 12 saat pesawat bombardier sudah membuat water scooping di perairan bukit jugra di mana lokasi kebakaran sejauh 10 batu dari kawasan kebakaran pesawat ini mampu terbang sehingga tiga jam bagi satu penerbangan dan pada operasi pagi tadi pesawat berjaya membuat 30 kali water bombing bagi dua pesawat dan dianggarkan 180000 liter air digugurkan pesawat melakukan water bombing meliputi kawasan seluas 15000 kaki persegi kami berharap agar orang ramai tidak mengeruhkan keadaan dengan melakukan pembakaran secara terbuka katanya pada sortie sebelah petang ini pengamal media turut dibawa menaiki pesawat terbabit bagi melihat sendiri operasi pemadaman yang dijalankan pesawat itu diterbangkan oleh kapten suhaimi abdul kadir bersama empat anak kapal itu berlepas dari stesen udara subang maritim kirakira jam 230 dan operasi mengambil masa selama tiga jam"

"people are seen wearing face masks during the movement control order in kuala lumpur march 242020 picture by miera zulyanakuala lumpur march 31 while the recently announced economic stimulus package includes welfare aid for the next two months it does not explain a viable fiscal plan pakatan harapan ph secretariat council today said dfpdisplayslot in a joint statement undersigned by pkr vicepresident datuk seri shamsul iskandar mohd akin parti amanah negara communications director khalid abdul samad and daps ong kian ming they said if implemented well the stimulus package can help malaysians meet their basic needs while they comply with the movement control order mco dfpdisplayslotmmstoryoutstream however the package does not explain the viable fiscal plan which prevents job losses as a result of the economic downturn faced by companies especially those categorised as smallmedium enterprises smes the statement said according to the statement smes in malaysia provide seven out of 10 jobs and play an important role in driving growth as well as income for the government through the payment of corporate tax dfpdisplayslotmmstorymreg2 therefore extra help is needed not only to protect the wellbeing of the people but also the fate of the smes it added dfpdisplayslotmmteads because the government will spend rm59 billion under the wage subsidy programme where it pays rm600 per month for three months for 33 million workers ph secretariat council saw the number as insufficient it is recommended that this payment be increased to rm1200 that is in line with the national minimum wage rate this will not only help employees but also smes by reducing the payroll burden and helping to prevent workers being let go this larger number is in line with efforts made in several other countries including singapore the united kingdom and australia the statement read the ph secretariat council also looks at the economic situation especially in the next six months deeming that it requires rigorous planning and bipartisan support this is due to the covid19 outbreak on the economy is longterm and can change the global economy therefore the secretariat council is calling for an emergency parliamentary session to discuss malaysias economic problems today including bipartisan cooperation to curb the outbreak and save the country the statement read the oneoff payments and loan repayment delays are part of the rm250 billion second stimulus package announced by muhyiddin to address economic concerns caused by the covid19 outbreak"

kangsargerikpengkalan hulu dan jalan kuala kangsargerikpengkalan hulu pemantauan tambahan di jalan itu diambil termasuk menambah infrastruktur oleh agensi terbabit bagi mengurangkan kadar kemalangan maut pada musim perayaan di jalan berkenaan katanya dalam sidang media selepas majlis pelancaran ops bersepadu dan kempen keselamatan jalan raya bersempena perayaan hari raya aidilfitri peringkat negeri di sebuah pasar raya besar di sini hari ini abdul yunus berkata pelancaran operasi bersepadu itu bertujuan meningkatkan kesedaran pengguna jalan raya mengenai keselamatan di jalan raya dalam usaha mengurangkan kemalangan dan kematian sempena perayaan abdul yunus berkata 1200 pegawai dan anggota penguatkuasa antaranya polis diraja malaysia jabatan pengangkutan jalan akan bertugas sepanjang tempoh ops bermula dari 29 mei hingga 12 jun ini selain itu abdul yunus berkata statistik polis menunjukkan jumlah kemalangan raya di perak berjumlah 37034 pada tahun lalu berbanding 38587 pada 2017 jumlah kematian juga mencatatkan penurunan iaitu 689 kematian pada tahun lalu berbanding 711 pada tahun 2017 katanya katanya plus malaysia berhad juga menggerakkan 156 petugas untuk memastikan kelancaran dan keselesaan pengguna jalan raya plus menjangkakan sebanyak 19 juta pengguna jalan raya akan melalui negeri ini tahun ini berbanding 14 juta kenderaan pada tahun 2018 iaitu peningkatan sebanyak 05 peratus katanya jabatan bomba dan penyelamat malaysia negeri perak juga menempatkan 42 jentera di empat plaza tol iaitu di slim river tapah kuala kangsar dan taiping bernama"
"saya tetap tabah walaupun terpaksa merangkak ke kelas untuk menimba ilmu kata graduan ijazah sarjana muda sains komputer dan matematik amin shafiq mohd zuki selepas menerima skrol pada istiadat konvokesyen universiti teknologi mara uitm melaka di lendu alor gajah semalam amin 24 yang menghidap penyakit saraf kaki hingga paras pinggang sejak lahir hanya menggunakan kerusi roda termasuk ketika di sekolah rendah menengah dan universiti bagi memudahkan pergerakannya beliau berkata walaupun berstatus sebagai orang kurang upaya oku ia bukan halangan buat dirinya untuk meneruskan pengajian bermula ketika peringkat diploma dan ijazah katanya terpaksa diangkat rakan untuk ke kelas termasuk di tingkat dua dan tiga bangunan universiti adalah pengalaman tidak akan dilupakan sepanjang hidupnya saya gembira di atas sokongan dan kerjasama rakan yang sanggup mendukung dan mengangkat saya beramairamai sematamata untuk saya dapat hadir ke kelas dan pengalaman itu tidak akan dilupakan sampai bilabila peristiwa itu adalah kenangan dan azimat berharga buat diri saya untuk sentiasa menghargai semua orang selain keazaman ingin membantu orang lain mengikut kemampuan saya selepas memiliki pekerjaan kelak katanya graduan uitm jasin itu anak sulung daripada lapan beradik itu menganggap status oku bukan halangan untuk mengikuti pengajian ke peringkat lebih tinggi dan paling penting adalah kemahuan dan keazaman justeru saya menjadikannya sebagai cabaran untuk berjaya dalam pendidikan dan kehidupan tambahan pula insan sekeliling terutama keluarga dan adikberadik amat prihatin dan memberi galakan yang tidak berbelah bahagi selepas ini saya berazam untuk membuka perniagaan sendiri sesuai dengan bidang dan kelulusan sekali gus membantu kedua ibu bapa yang sudah banyak berjasa katanya yang berasal dari kampung cherang hangus bachok kelantan beliau berkata dengan keadaan bapanya yang juga penjual burger semakin tidak sihat selain ibu yang tidak bekerja yang berlangsung di dewan taming sari uitm kampus lendu alor gajah semua diploma dan ijazah disampaikan oleh pro canselor uitm tan sri dr arshad ayob sementara itu ibu amin siti maryam harun 45 amat berbangga dengan pencapaian anak sulungnya itu sekali gus menjadi contoh kepada adiknya yang lain"

"umno online laman berita rasmi pertubuhan kebangsaan melayu bersatu atau umno kuala lumpur 30 sept timbalan presiden umno datuk seri mohamad hasan yakin dan percaya tanggungjawab yang akan dipikul bersama mampu menterjemahkan yang terbaik untuk parti bangkit dan seterusnya mendapat kepercayaan rakyat keseluruhannya berucap pada sesi penggulungan perhimpunan agung umno 2018 yang melabuhkan tirainya petang tadi beliau menegaskan tanggungjawab tersebut tidak hanya terpikul di bahu kepimpinan presiden parti atau pimpinan tertinggi yang lain sebaliknya menjadi tanggungajawab bersama kita sebagai ahli parti dalam menjayakan apa yang telah digariskan oleh presiden parti datuk seri dr ahmad zahid hamidi yang berasaskan tujuh teras dan 21 langkah pada pada masa yang sama kita kena lihat bagaimana untuk ambil balik hati orangmacam mana nak pujuk balik orang maka ubahlah apa yang patut kita ubah dan buatlah apa yang patut kita buat supaya kesilapankesilapan yang lalu tidak lagi kita ulangi katanya di sini hari ini mohamad seterusnya mengajak ahli parti untuk samasama membina parti yang dilanda tsunami pada 9 mei yang lalu mari kita susun balik batubata yang runtuh oleh tsunami yang melanggar kita pada 9 mei lalukita jadikan benteng yang lebih kukuh dan dinding yang lebih kuat untuk pastikan umno bangkit dan bangun selepas ini kita balik dengan tekad yang baik untuk kita bangunkan parti ini semua ahli dan cawangan serta bahagian dan pimpinan pelbagai peringkat mesti mempunyai hasrat untuk bangun semula dengan adanya reform parti kita ini dan strategi nak menang pilihan raya maka saya yakin dan percaya hasrat untuk kita bangun semula akan dapat kita jayakan ujarnya jelasnya lagi umno menerusi bn telah mentadbir negara sejak sekian lama namun kerana sedikit kesilapan parti mengalami kekalahan jangan kita bermimpi lagi ada orang bawa tepak sirih untuk jemput marilah bersama dengan kitakalau mereka bawa tepak sirih kita tengok tepak sirih yang macam mana kalau setakat mereka bawa tepak sirih untuk kita jadi penumpang sahajakita tidak mahu jadi second fiddle tambahnya dalam ucapannya itu juga beliau turut mengingatkan ahli parti agar terus menabur bakti dan jasa serta tidak melayani tindakan sesetengah pihak yang memperkecilkan parti tidak guna untuk berdebat dalam sesuatu isu dengan orang yang sedang bermegah dan memegang kuasa ketika ini esok bila orang dah mula muak orang dah marah kita pula bersikap sebaliknya katanya mediaumno"

"guru kerugian rm113000 selepas ditipu sindiket macau scam yang mendakwa mangsa terbabit dengan penggubahan wang haram wanita berusia 51 tahun itu dikatakan menerima panggilan daripada suspek yang mendakwa sebagai pegawai polis dan kakitangan bank pada 28 februari lalu ketua jabatan siasatan jenayah komersial pahang superintendan mohd wazir mohd yusof berkata suspek mendakwa mangsa terbabit dalam kes penggubahan wang haram berjumlah rm15 juta dan perlu membayar sejumlah wang jaminan bagi mengelak dikenakan tindakan undangundang pada awalnya suspek iaitu seorang wanita memperkenalkan diri sebagai kakitangan bank dan memaklumkan mangsa mempunyai tunggakan bayaran pinjaman sebelum menyambung panggilan kepada pegawai polis dikenali sebagai sarjan wong pegawai polis itu memaklumkan mangsa terbabit dalam kes penggubahan wang haram berjumlah rm15 juta dan menyambung panggilan kepada seorang lagi pegawai polis inspektor narita yang berjanji boleh membantu mangsa menyelesaikan kes berkenaan mangsa yang percaya dengan dakwaan itu membuat pinjaman bank berjumlah rm80000 untuk membayar wang jaminan seperti diarahkan suspek katanya mohd wazir berkata pada 6 mac lalu mangsa dihubungi inspektor narita dan memaklumkan akaun tabung haji dan bank rakyat miliknya akan dibekukan bank negara malaysia bnm suspek meminta mangsa pergi ke bank terbabit untuk menukar nombor telefon didaftarkan kepada nombor telefon lain yang diberikan olehnya mangsa kemudian mengikut segala arahan diberikan oleh inspektor narita kerana bimbang akan dikenakan tindakan katanya beliau berkata selepas mangsa melakukan proses berkenaan inspektor narita melarang dia untuk melakukan sebarang transaksi selama tujuh hari kononnya untuk siasatan katanya jumaat lalu mangsa mula berasa curiga dan terus menghubungi rakannya yang bekerja sebagai penolong pengurus bank serta hasil semakan mendapati berlaku pindahan wang dari akaunnya ke dalam akaun lain berjumlah rm113000 sebelum membuat laporan di ibu pejabat polis daerah ipd kuantan semalam kes disiasat mengikut seksyen 420 kanun keseksaan kerana menipu"

nst20191130dr m give ph govt five years to implement pledgeshttpswwwnstcommynewsnation201911543391drmgivephgovtfiveyearsimplementpledges petaling jaya prime minister tun dr mahathir urged malaysians to give the pakatan harapan ph government five years to implement its pledges at the end of the five year period the people can evaluate and judge the performance of the ph government he said dr mahathir said malaysians who no longer had faith on the government could determine their future through the ballot box in the 15th general election ge15 he said at the moment the government found it tough to achieve its aims due to the severe damage caused by the previous administration to the nation if you no longer have faith with the government you can vote in the ge15 they the people determine but we promised a lot and will take five years to implement the pledges before we can keep our promise but what happened during the drawingup of the manifesto we didnt get full information and when took over the government we find the damage done by the previous government was far more serious than we thought this was what caused us difficulty to achieve out goal keeping the 14th general election manifesto pledges he said dr mahathir was speaking after officiating the 58th annual general meeting of the malaysian muslim welfare organisation perkim here today the prime minister was commenting on the national worry index nwi survey outcome by thinktank emir research which revealed that malaysians are in a state of high anxiety surrounding issues the cost of living jobs economics and security the thinktanks survey also found that respondents were either unsure or disagreed that the pakatan harapan was competitive and the nation was on the right track or that malaysias economy was on solid foundation the survey was conducted between sept 5 and oct 10 involving 1992 respondents comprising 656 per cent malays and bumiputera chinese 282 per cent and indians 62 percent dr mahathir explained that there were also many factors which caused the cost of living to increase including the weak ringgit and transportation cost we are facing a problem involving the cost of living due to the fact that some quarters had devalued our currency if in the past one us dollar gave you rm380 its is now rm420 due to this currency value everything we buy has become costlier as our currency had devalued this is one reason and the government is discussing this the prices of some goods have also seen a reduction but the people do not see that he said in a separate development dr mahathir said the government needed to conduct a thorough review of the security offenses special measures act 2012 sosma as it was difficult to determine security cases he said the government did not want to take the easy path of releasing terrorists who were found to be involved in crimes such as bombing at the same time he said the government could not detain suspects for a long period of time for criminal offences such as undermining the economy without proper evidence new straits timesnew straits times press m bhda part of media prima group17107politikpakatan harapan

"palu at least 384 people were killed many swept away by giant waves as they played on the beach when a major earthquake and tsunami hit the indonesian island of sulawesi authorities said on saturday hundreds had gathered for a festival on the beach of the city of palu on friday when waves up to 6m high smashed ashore just on dusk sweeping many to their death and destroying anything in their path when the tsunami threat arose yesterday people were still doing their activities on the beach and did not immediately run and they became victims sutopo purwo nugroho spokesman of indonesias disaster mitigation agency bnpb said in news briefing in jakarta the tsunami didnt come by itself it dragged cars logs houses it hit everything on land nugroho said amateur footage shown by local tv stations showed waves crashing into houses along palus shoreline scattering shipping containers and flooding into a mosque in the city nugroho said the tsunami had struck with a speed of 800 kmph destroying buildings and infrastructure strong aftershocks continued to rock the coastal city on saturday morning following the massive 75 magnitude earthquake on friday which triggered the tsunami nugroho described the damage as extensive with thousands of houses hospitals shopping malls and hotels collapsed a bridge washed away and the main highway to palu cut off due to a landslide bodies of some victims were found trapped under the rubble of collapsed buildings he said adding 540 people were injured and 29 missing dozens of injured people were being treated in makeshift medical tents set up outdoors tv images showed photos confirmed by authorities showed bodies being lined up along the street on saturday some in bags and some with their faces covered with clothes indonesias meteorological and geophysics agency bmkg issued a tsunami warning after the quake but lifted it 34 minutes later the agency has been widely criticised for not informing a tsunami had hit palu on saturday though officials said waves had come within the time the warning was issued the quake and tsunami caused a major power outage that cut communications around palu and on saturday authorities were still having difficulties coordinating rescue efforts nugroho said the quake intensity was much higher in the fishing town of donggala which was closer to the epicentre and they expect the damage there to be much worse but have not been able to establish communications more than 600000 people live in donggala and palu chief security minister wiranto told tvone the military had started sending in cargo planes from the capital jakarta carrying relief aid the citys airport is slated to reopen on saturday afternoon after being closed as its runway and air traffic control tower was damaged in the quake authorities said president joko widodo is scheduled to visit evacuation centres in palu on sunday the palu area was hit by a less powerful quake earlier on friday which destroyed some houses killed one person and injured at least 10 in donggala authorities said the us geological survey put the magnitude of the second quake at a strong 75 after first saying it was 77 indonesia sits on the pacific ring of fire and is regularly hit by earthquakes in august a series of major quakes killed over 500 people in the tourist island of lombok and destroyed dozens of villages along its northern coast palu was hit by tsunami in 1927 and 1968 according to bnpb reuters exclusive stories"
"polis hari ini menyoal siasat seorang ahli parlimen dari perlis selama hampir tujuh jam susulan dakwaan mencabul remaja bawah umur dalam kejadian 20 oktober lalu sumber polis berkata ahli parlimen berkenaan yang pernah dilantik sebagai menteri ketika pemerintahan kerajaan barisan nasional tiba di ibu pejabat polis bukit aman kuala lumpur kirakira 10 pagi tadi katanya siasatan dijalankan oleh bahagian siasatan seksual penderaan dan kanakkanak d11 ahli parlimenitu tiba di bukit aman untuk siasatan sekitar 10 pagi tadi dan soal siasat mengambil masa agak lama disebabkan pegawai terpaksa berhenti merakam percakapan beberapa kali untuk memberi ruang kepadanya untuk berehat ini kerana ahli parlimen itu memaklumkan tidak beberapa sihat dan mohon untuk berehat ketika soal siasat dijalankan katanya ketika dihubungi hari ini menurut sumber itu juga polis hanya selesai merakam percakapannya pada 5 petang dan berkemungkinan akan memanggilnya semula jika terdapat keperluan berbuat demikian kelmarin nstp melaporkan bahawa pengerusi badan bertindak pemantau jenayah malaysia mywatch datuk r sri sanjeevan mendakwa wujud cubaan untuk menutup satu kejadian cabul remaja perempuan berusia 15 tahun oleh seorang vvip barubaru ini sanjeevan mendakwa remaja perempuan itu dicabul ahli parlimen berkenaan di dalam kereta di kangar perlis 20 oktober lalu namun sehingga kini masih belum ada sebarang tindakan diambil polis katanya kejadian berlaku 1130 malam selepas mangsa membuat persembahan muzik bersama kumpulan dalam satu program dihadiri lelaki itu remaja itu kemudian mengadukan perbuatan itu kepada ibu bapanya sebelum membuat laporan di balai polis di kangar pada 250 pagi keesokannya tidak sampai 3 jam selepas kejadian susulan itu ketua polis perlis senior asisten komisioner noor mushar mohd semalam memaklumkan bahawa polis masih melakukan siasatan mengenai kes itu biarpun pengadu iaitu remaja berusia 15 tahun sudah menarik semula laporan polis dibuat katanya polis sudah merekodkan keterangan 10 individu termasuk anggota parlimen berkenaan dan bekerjasama dengan polis bukit aman bagi merekodkan keterangan anggota parlimen berkenaan di kuala lumpur polis kini sedang mendapatkan nasihat daripada timbalan pendakwa raya sama ada kes itu boleh diteruskan untuk pendakwaan atau tidak malah siasatan kesitu dibuat mengikut seksyen 14a akta kesalahankesalahan seksual terhadap kanakkanak 2017"
"bukan calangcalang harga ditawarkan berikutan seekor burung murai batu copsychus malabaricus berasal dari malaysia boleh dijual mencecah 100 juta rupiah rm29435 seekor di pasaran gelap indonesia walaupun ada pelbagai spesies burung murai tempatan di republik itu namun kemerduan suara burung murai batu malaysia dianggap sukar ditandingi menyebabkan hidupan liar dilindungi itu terus diseludup secara besarbesaran ke negara jiran ketua pengarah jabatan perlindungan hidupan liar dan taman negara perhilitan semenanjung malaysia datuk abdul kadir abu hashim berkata terbaru sepasukan pasukan polis marin ppm pengerang johor berjaya menumpaskan tindakan sindiket yang cuba menyeludup keluar burung murai batu tempatan secara besarbesaran menurutnya dalam operasi jam 11 pagi semalam polis menyerbu sebuah premis di felda adela kota tinggi johor anggota ppm pengerang dan perhilitan melakukan pemeriksaan terhadap premis diserbu di kota tinggi johor tiada tangkapan dilakukan namun pihak polis menemui 165 bekas dan sangkar disembunyikan di dalam premis itu ada juga 335 ekor burung murai batu yang dipercayai mahu diseludup keluar ke negara jiran bagaimanapun cubaan itu dipatahkan oleh polis susulan maklumat diperoleh katanya menurutnya semua rampasan itu kemudian dibawa dan diserahkan ke pejabat perhilitan bandar penawar di sini untuk tindakan lanjut ditanya mengapa burung murai batu sering ditangkap dan cuba diseludup ke negara jiran beliau tidak menafikan faktor suara merdu haiwan itu menyebabkan ia menjadi tarikan penggemar burung di sana menurutnya tindakan menyimpan burung murai batu yang juga hidupan liar dilindungi boleh didakwa mengikut seksyen 602 akta pemuliharaan hidupan liar 2010 dan boleh dihukum denda tidak kurang rm20000 dan tidak lebih daripada rm50000 atau dipenjara selama tempoh tidak lebih tiga tahun atau keduaduanya antara sangkar berisi 335 ekor burung murai batu di sebuah premis di kota tinggi ini adalah rampasan terbaru selepas ppm wilayah dua johor menahan tiga lelaki dipercayai cuba menyeludup burung murai batu bernilai rm487160 ke negara jiran dalam serbuan di jalan teluk ramunia sungai rengit kota tinggi pada isnin lalu tiga individu berusia 38 hingga 50 tahun itu ditahan menerusi op landai sekitar jam 130 pagi hasil pemeriksaan menemui raga masingmasing berisi pelbagai jenis burung dilindungi iaitu sebanyak 442 burung murai batu dan 551 burung murai kampung dianggarkan bernilai rm487160"

"edmund leenewsdesk thesundaily com kulim four vietnamese criminals who were involved in a series of burglary cases were shot dead by cops in an exchange of fire near the lunas toll plaza after breaking into a house in the vicinity early this morning the four suspects in their s and s and known as geng tebuk were confronted by police after breaking into the house kedah cid chief sac mior faridalatrash wahid told the media that his men who were on crime prevention rounds around the neighbourhood came across the four suspects behaving suspiciously in a car when our officers introduced themselves and asked the suspects to step out of the car the suspects did not do so but sped off he told reporters this morning a km high speed chase then ensued before police managed to corner them mior said one of them tried to attack police with a parang while another armed with a pistol fired a few shots which forced police to retaliate resulting in the suspects being shot dead we recovered two parang a pistol passports and a few house break in tools he said investigators also found valuables in a box believed to belong to the house owner who sustained losses during the burglary earlier mior believes police have now solved a series of house break in cases in alor star and baling adding that this group of four were active in penang kedah and selangor exclusive stories"
"sandakan the sabah wildlife department is finding it difficult to catch elephant killers because witnesses fear coming forward despite the offer of a rm reward its director augustine tuuga said the reward was for information that could hold up in court the department was serious about nabbing the culprits but needed the cooperation of the people in bringing them to book he said in a statement it was in response to a spate of deaths of the endangered animals which were shot or snared in traps in jungles and plantations in the state in the latest incident a cow elephant aged between and years was found dead with a gunshot wound in the head in the bintang emas oil palm plantation in tongod on saturday bernama exclusive stories"

"kuala lumpur feb 28 petroliam nasional bhd petronas has announced a breakthrough invention called the advance diagnostic and prognostic technology adapt a digital solution that predicts mechanical damage at various facilities to prevent unplanned plant shutdown and revenue loss the global energy and solutions company said the solution developed by local talents is a quantum leap technology in structure health monitoring and has the potential to be used at facilities beyond the energy sector including construction shipping aeronautics motorsports and automobiles adapt replaces manual and conventional inspections by predicting structural and mechanical cracks through continuous online monitoring offering accurate prediction based on pressure temperature and flow patterns it said in a statement today adapt was launched by petronas project delivery and technology senior vicepresident samsudin miskon accompanied by project delivery and technology head of group technical solutions gts khairol anuar shukri and petronas chemicals mtbe sdn bhd pcmtbe chief executive officer azlimi m lazim petronas said the solution detected early signs of mechanical damage to allow prediction of assets remaining life expectancy and avoided unplanned shutdown of plants it said the digital solution is a collaboration involving gts pcmtbe and universiti teknologi petronas which began in january 2018 khairol anuar said adapt is the result of petronas innovation capability underpinned by a passion for technological advancement in its operational culture the fruition of adapt with its high performance and accuracy is another testament to petronas commitment as a progressive energy and solutions partner he said meanwhile azlimi said with adapt pcmtbe has optimised plant efficiency by planning around the predicted remaining life expectancy the digital solution had successfully avoided the unplanned shutdown that could have cost us rm30 million it had also increased pcmtbes production by seven per cent worth rm63 million from april 2019 to december 2019 he added petronas said it is also welcoming partnerships to deploy adapt as the application is not limited to the energy sector"
"tanjung malim seorang lelaki maut dipercayai ditetak dengan parang panjang oleh seorang lelaki yang dikatakan mengalami masalah mental di jalan malim 6 taman malim di sini kirakira jam 9 pagi semalam timbalan ketua polis daerah muallim deputi superintendan koo tai chew mangsa dikenali sebagai g d subramaniam 34 yang bekerja sebagai wireman sehubungan itu polis menahan suspek seorang penganggur berusia 57 tahun yang dikatakan mengalami masalah mental sejak keluar dari penjara tapah tiga tahun lepas kerana kesalahan dadah suspek pernah dirawat di hospital slim river tiga tahun lepas dan mengambil ubat penenang untuk mengelakkan penyakit mentalnya datang namun sudah lebih kurang setahun suspek tidak mengambil lagi ubat itu kerana dia enggan dan merasakan tiada ubat yang dapat menyembuhkan penyakitnya katanya dalam kenyataan hari ini koo berkata menurut ibunya suspek juga sering keluar rumah dengan membawa sebilah parang kayu atau buluh yang terdapat di rumahnya dan akan memarahi orang di sekelilingnya tanpa sebab di samping mengejar individu tersebut jika melihat atau merenungnya menurutnya suspek mengaku telah memukul mangsa dengan menggunakan sebilah parang panjang kerana mangsa telah merenungnya semasa mereka berada di tepi jalan di tempat kejadian setelah itu mangsa pun rebah dan suspek terus pergi meninggalkan mangsa dan telah pergi ke bengkel berdekatan lalu memecahkan cermin kereta peti surat dan pasu bunga dengan menggunakan parang yang sama ujarnya suspek yang mempunyai 14 rekod jenayah lampau kemudiannya dikatakan pulang ke rumah dan menukar pakaiannya sebelum keluar semula menaiki motosikal menuju ke belakang sebuah pasaraya untuk menghisap dadah katanya suspek pergi semula ke tempat kejadian mangsa dipukul dan mendapati mangsa telah terbaring atas rumput dan masih bernafas namun tidak bangun suspek kemudiannya pulang ke rumahnya yang tidak jauh dari tempat kejadian dan mengambil sebaldi air dan pergi ke arah mangsa tetapi mangsa telah berada di dalam longkang bersebelahannya suspek telah bertindak mencurah air ke atas badan mangsa dengan harapan mangsa akan bangun ujarnya menurut koo hasil pemeriksaan forensik mendapati terdapat kecederaan mangsa luka sepanjang 6 sentimeter di bawah telinga sebelah kiri dengan kedalaman 2 sentimeter rumah yang bersebelahan dengan tempat kejadian tidak berpenghuni kerana sedang dalam proses ubahsuai dan tiada kamera litar tertutup cctv mahupun saksi bebas menyaksikan kejadian tersebut polis merampas sebilah parang panjang berukuran 76 sentimeter dan kes disiasat mengikut seksyen 302 kanun keseksaan"
sarawakvoice20191130kongres pkr diadakan 5 disemberdi sebalik krisis yang melandahttpssarawakvoicecom20191130kongrespkrdiadakan5disemberdisebalikkrisisyangmelandakuching kongres nasional pkr ke14 akan diadakan di melaka international trade centre mitc dari 5 hingga 8 disember ini kongres sempena 20 tahun penubuhan pkr ini berlangsung selepas selesai siri konvensyen peringkat negeri di seluruh negara dari 13 oktober hingga hari ini konvensyen di sarawak diboikotkan oleh pengerusi pkr negeri baru bian puak yang dianggap menyokong timbalan presiden pkr datuk seri mohamed azmin ali pengarah komunikasi pkr fahmi fadzil dalam kenyataannya semalam tema sambutan dua dekad merakyatkan reformasi menurutnya kongres itu akan bermula dengan perasmian kongres wanita keadilan pada 9 malam 5 disember 2019 perasmian kongres angkatan muda amk pula akan berlangsung pada 215 petang 6 disember 2019 presiden pkr datuk seri anwar ibrahim dijadualkan menyampaikan ucapan dasarnya kepada peserta kongres nasional keadilan pada 9 pagi 7 disember 2019413politikpkr
"putrajaya the act of swindling money from the 1malaysia development bhd 1mdb is also a major sin as such an act may lead to the destruction of the country says minister in the prime ministers department datuk seri dr mujahid yusof rawa he said the definition of sinfulness which was commonly associated with evil consequences should be seen in the wider context and not limited to drinking alcoholic beverages and adultery muslims tend to associate social problems with evil by referring to surah alrum verse 41 whereas there are other verses of the quran which mention the evil consequences of some of the acts of men such as living luxurious lifestyle practising wasteful or careless spending and committing corruption yes all kinds of sins have their evil consequences but the definition of the sins should also be understood in the wider context he told a press conference after opening the 14th muzakarah of syariah advisory council for islamic financial institutions in malaysia here today meanwhile mujahid said the disaster relief fund to help victims of earthquake and tsunami in sulawesi indonesia which was launched by jakim on oct 4 had successfully raised rm1167 million as such he said he would work with the malaysian islamic organisation consultative council mapim to distribute the aid in various forms such as cash and food as well as in the repair of houses and mosques mujahid said the fund would continue to be opened as public contributions were still needed to help the neighbouring country in the postdisaster period bernama exclusive stories"
kuala nerang presiden pkr datuk seri anwar ibrahim menyokong perbicaraan bekas perdana menteri datuk seri najib tun razak disiarkan secara langsung httpswwwsinarhariancommyarticle21046beritanasionalanwarsokongperbicaraannajibdisiarsecaralangsung kuala nerang presiden pkr datuk seri anwar ibrahim menyokong perbicaraan bekas perdana menteri datuk seri najib tun razak disiarkan secara langsung menurutnya tidak menjadi masalah perkara itu dilakukan kerana rakyat berhak mengetahui perkembangan semasa berhubung kes berkenaa perkara ini saya serah kepada mahkamah sama ada disiarkan secara langsung ataupun tidak selama ini tidak pernah berlaku ada baik supaya rakyat tahu berapa banyak wang di negara ini dirompak katanya selepas program majlis dialog bersama penoreh getah seluruh padang terap di pengkalan tok mas mukim pedu dekat sini najib sebelum ini melalui facebook rasminya menyokong siaran langsung kerana ia akan membantu ketelusan dan memastikan rule of law pemerintahan mengikut undangundang dapat dipatuhi kerana rakyat mempunyai hak untuk mengetahui kebenaran perbicaraan akan bermula rabu depan dan najib berdepan tujuh tuduhan src international sdn bhd dalam perkembangan lain anwar berharap pengurusan felda akan mengambil kira pandangan pengerusi majlis permuafakatan ngo felda mpnf datuk mazlan aliman bagi menjawab kegelisahan yang dihadapi oleh para peneroka menurutnya mazlan adalah jurucakap kepada peneroka felda pada zaman pemerintahan bn sehinggalah kepada kerajaan ph hari ini sebelum ini pertubuhan bukan kerajaan felda meluahkan rasa kecewa kerana masih belum ada sebarang pelan pemulihan selepas ph membentuk kerajaan sejak 10 bulan lalu sebaliknya bayaran pinjaman sara hidup pula diturunkan1028politikpkr

"kementerian perdagangan dalam negeri dan hal ehwal pengguna kpdnhep sudah berbincang dengan sembilan pengusaha panggung wayang di sarawak bagi memasang kamera anti rakaman di pawagam masingmasing pengarah kpdnhep sarawak datuk stanley tan berkata usaha itu dilakukan bagi memudahkan pemeriksaan kerana ada penonton memuat naik rakaman secara langsung ke media sosial selain untuk penghasilan bahan cetak rompak kita tidak mahu perakam terlepas kerana perbuatan itu boleh membunuh industri wayang di negara ini pihak kpdnhep tidak akan berkompromi dan akan mengambil tindakan undangundang terhadap mereka didapati merakam filem ditayang di pawagam di seluruh negeri ini katanya selepas pemeriksaan di panggung wayang mbo kuching semalam beliau berkata pihaknya akan terus mengadakan pemeriksaan mengejut di semua panggung wayang seluruh sarawak bagi mengesan penonton yang merakam tayangan filem menggunakan telefon bimbit atau perakam video penonton melakukan perbuatan itu akan dikenakan tindakan undangundang mengikut seksyen 43a antirakaman kamera akta hakcipta 1987 mereka boleh dikenakan denda tidak kurang rm10000 dan tidak melebihi rm100000 atau penjara tidak melebihi tempoh lima tahun atau keduaduanya sekali katanya"

"former prime minister datuk seri najib razak waves at the media as he enters criminal high court 3 at the kuala lumpur courts complex july 4 2018 picture by azneal ishakkuala lumpur oct 31 the case of former prime minister datuk seri najib razak who was charged with 25 counts of graft and money laundering involving rm228 billion linked to 1malaysia development bhd 1mdb fund will be heard at the high court this followed a decision by high court judge mohd nazlan mohd ghazali in allowing najibs application to transfer the case from sessions court to the high court these 25 charges contain a myriad of transactions and involve public interest both locally and internationally another case involving src international has also been transferred to the high court im of the view that a transfer would expedite the cause of justice hence im allowing the application under section 417 1e of the criminal procedure code the judge said mmstorymreg2 earlier retired federal court judge datuk seri gopal sri ram who was appointed as senior deputy public prosecutor told the court that today was fixed to hear najibs application to transfer his case and the prosecution had no objection it is in the interest of justice otherwise we would have some of the cases tried in sessions court some in high court he said najibs lawyer harvinderjit singh told the court the defence would be arguing on novel and complex issues in the case that should be dealt with the high court when asked by the judge on the number of charges najib was facing harvinderjit said his client faced four charges of graft under the malaysian anticorruption commission macc act and 21 charges of money laundering under the antimoney laundering and antiterrorism financing act 2001 involving the 1mdb funds of rm228 billion he was alleged to have committed all the offences at amislamic bank berhad no 55 jalan raja chulan bukit ceylon between 2011 and 2014 bernama"
malaysiachronicle20190401pakatan wants to kill me off mat hasan in rantau umno talks of killing while dr streram wants to healhttpswwwmalaysiachroniclecomp161186 politics april 1 2019 by 0 comments seremban barisan nasional candidate for the rantau byelection datuk seri mohamad hasan says pakatan harapan is vying to win the seat for the first time in 60 years in order to kill him off he said that it was not because rantau was an especially important seat to conquer but pakatan wanted to see an end to his political career and silence him from criticising the negri sembilan state government they want to win in rantau and stop the momentum of umno and barisan nasionals uprising and winning streak and in rantau im the person that they should kill off if im alive pakatan will be against us he said at a ceramah in taman nusari bayu 2 bandar sri sendayan on sunday night he said this was to lessen the impact of barisans winning momentum in the two previous byelections in cameron highlands and semenyih in ge14 i never campaigned in this area pakatan wants to win in rantau because we have won in cameron highlands and semenyih they want to stop the momentum ive never seen the ec holding a meeting for a month to set the date for a byelection because they want to kill off our momentum of winning byelections he said rantau polling day on april 13 will see mohamad squaring off against pakatan candidate dr s streram and independent candidates mohd nor yassin and malar rajaram the rantau byelection was triggered following a federal court decision to uphold an earlier ruling by the election court to nullify the results for rantau in ge14 umno deputy president mohamad won the state seat unopposed after dr streram was denied entry to submit his nomination papers as he did not have a tag or a pass election court judge azimah omar allowed dr strerams petition for a byelection on the grounds that mohamads election victory was not valid the rantau polls is the seventh byelection postge14 and the third to be held in 2019 after cameron highlands and semenyih the star during his official walkabout in rantau on sunday pakatan harapan candidate dr s streram says there is a need for a fire and rescue department as well as better health facilities there there have been fatalities and loss of property when fire engines and ambulances took too long to reach the scenes and patients he said after being nominated as one of the four candidates for the april 13 rantau byelection the star the star copyright 2019 malaysia chronicle6137bencanarescue department

"kuala lumpur the implementation of the sales and services tax sst beginning this saturday is not expected to make a major difference in the price of services according to tax expert norsa adah ahmad this was because the six percent tax imposed on services such as those provided by hotels insurance and food catering companies was the same as that imposed by the goods and services tax gst before this there should not be much difference with the previous price most prices will remain the same compared to the effect of sst on the price of other goods where the public is watching to see if prices increase or not the price of services is not expected to show much difference she told bernama today however norsa adah who is also a member of the malaysian institute of accountants mia did not discount the possibility of double taxation on the price of food and drinks sold in food outlets she said a sales tax is imposed on certain products like canned drinks at the production stage and it was not impossible that restaurants would increase their prices to cover the service tax among the services on which the sst is imposed are those provided by night clubs private clubs golf clubs casinos lotteries telecommunications paid television legal services accounting services forwarding agents architects engineers valuers security parking car rentals advertising domestic services information technology services credit cards and electrical services meanwhile hoteliers also do not expect an increase in room rates with the sst except for the usual increase during peak periods such as school holidays due to high demand however executive director of the malaysian association of hotel owners shaharudin m saaid said if the mechanism for the tax was the same as the previous sst the room rates are expected to decrease if the mechanism is the same as sst before the gst was imposed then room rates should be cheaper as the sst did not impose a six percent tax on service charges he said he said under the gst a six percent tax was imposed on service charges resulting in an increase in the price of rooms and other services however shaharudin hoped the mechanism for the implementation of the new sst is explained to the hotels quickly to avoid any confusion we are waiting for clarification from the royal malaysian customs department he said bernama exclusive stories"

"kuala lumpur youth and sports minister syed saddiq syed abdul rahman stressed that lim teong kims position as director of the national football academy under the national football development programme nfdp would not be affected according to syed saddiq who admitted to craving for the day malaysia would qualify for the world cup he felt responsible after the failure of the national squad to qualify for the under17 world cup in peru next year i did not sack lim teong kim and nfdp will continue immediately after the match the fam football association of malaysia had sacked teong kim as the national under16 squad coach this has nothing to do with nfdp and he is still a legitimate director of the national football academy under the nfdp until now he said in a statement today however he added he could not escape from the reality that nfdp is facing a severe financial situation at this time a special fund of rm20 million a year from the previous government was not received as promised since the first year nfdp was launched as a result of this problem the msn national sports council of malaysia today have to use their own funds which were taken from the allocations for other purposes to bear the expenses of nfdp syed saddiq said he was adamant in his stand to reevaluate the salary package given to teong kim which is almost rm175000 per month under the nfdp and did intend to question his eligibility to receive a certain amount of salary people need to know that prior to this 80 of his salary was paid by sponsors but since the past two years msn was making all these payments after the sponsor withdrew msns responsibility to other sports will also be affected he added commenting further he said the reevaluation was not just from the aspect of the managements salaries but included other aspects of the programme namely management competitions equipment expenses and the young nfdp athletes in a similar statement syed saddiq who is also muar mp said he would talk with his counterpart from the ministry of finance lim guan eng to take into account the need for a suitable allocation to continue to help develop football at the grassroots level at the same time efforts to bring in more sponsors are being continued and show positive growth we need more involvements from the corporate sector in the development of national sports he added bernama exclusive stories"
"kuala lumpur the first time the umno general assembly was held this year with the party as an opposition the atmosphere at the putra world trade centre pwtc here was seen less lively than in previous years the permanent location of the annual gathering remained the focus of the delegates nationwide to attend the assembly which began last night with the opening of the women youth and puteri wings general assembly and would end tomorrow but the attendance of the people was somewhat muted this year songket cloth vendor nik kamariah mustapha 63 from kota bharu kelantan conceded that the atmosphere of the assembly this time was not as vibrant as before nik kamariah who had traded at the assembly for 30 years said that since her stall opened yesterday only 10 pieces of songket were sold and the amount was very small compared to previous years in the past sales could reach rm70000 or rm80000 in a fiveday assembly but this assembly is only for three days so i do not know how many i can sell i hope to sell at least rm30000 to get back my capital she told bernama a kota putera state assembly constituency wanita umno delegation observer from besut terengganu kamariah salim 64 who had been loyal to the assembly since the age of 40 years felt that the previous excitement was gone the people are also not that many compared to previously normally the main lobby is congested one also had to queue up to use the toilet because its crowded but the spirit has eroded somewhat but in its absence we still come voluntarily the gathering is akin to a tradition which we indeed await she said however sabahs kalabakan umno division puteri delegate dewi susanti suparman 32 said the excitement was still there but the threeday conference compared to five previously made it appear less so a bernamas survey found that in terms of preparation the assembly was no less than past years with the halls spaces and main pillars at pwtc also decorated with various posters graphics banners and flags the media area was available for 562 media workers from 52 agencies in the print and electronic media comprising 39 locals and seven international bodies covering the 70yearold partys gathering for exhibition and sale spaces about 100 outlets also enlivened the assembly by selling various small and medium industries products including textiles food and beverages bernama exclusive stories"
