malaysiakini20190331dap man urges pahang to cease evictions offer way out for farmershttpswwwmalaysiakinicomnews470282chiong said this is as the second phase of enforcement involving 50 farms is set to begin on april 11 in the first phase 61 farms located upstream of sungai ichat were evicted as the pahang government cited the need to prevent the kuala terla water catchment area from being further polluted seeing as how the state governments actions have resulted in confusion among farmers in cameron highlands i call on the state authorities to postpone enforcement action and hold dialogues with farmers there so a winwin solution can be found besides enforcement the state authorities should offer the evicted farmers a way out he said in a statement today not trespassers chiong claimed that the farmers concerned were not trespassers but rather have farmed small time in cameron highlands for many years he added that the pahang government has failed to provide a satisfactory explanation for the evictions and pointed to confusing statements on the temporary operating licences tols issued to farmers the state authority claimed the earliest tol issued was in 1993 but we can prove there are farmers who got their tol in 1971 or 48 years ago why are they repeatedly making untrue claims against these farmers was the decision to take enforcement action done in a rush without thorough examination or is the aim to tarnish the farmers names so they do not obtain the rakyats sympathy he said a photo sighted by malaysiakini showed that one of the tols was issued in 1971 the authenticity of the document has yet to be verified however chiong was commenting on the case of the eviction of farmers in cameron highlands who pahang menteri besar wan rosdy wan ismail below claimed were polluting sungai ichat one of the rivers that supply water to residents as such wan rosdy had said the state had no optionbut to carry on with the enforcement actions against the farms located upstream of the river this was contested by penang deputy chief minister ii p ramasamy who claimed that the affected farmers had been tilling the land for over 60 years he also noted that it is sungai terla that supplies water to residents not sungai ichat the move ramasamy claimed was politically motivated as the farmers were allegedly supporters of pakatan harapan in the recent cameron highlands byelection these claims were later quashed by the menteri besar who said there was little evidence that the farmers had been there for more than six decades adding that tols were only given to the farmers over 20 years ago wan rosdy also added that both sungai ichat and sungai terla are raw sources of water for the kuala terla water catchment area132politikpakatan harapan

"tuan ibrahim said the move would have major implications for the country and the people picture by shafwan zaidonkuala lumpur oct 31 pas described the move to ratify the international convention on the elimination of all forms of racial discrimination icerd a catastrophe as it touched several provisions under article 153 of the federal constitution pas deputy president datuk tuan ibrahim tuan man said the matter would have major implications for the country and the people we urge the government not to accept the icerd and if the government continues with it i think there will be a mass mobilisation of the people as its implications are not just for the muslims this include the people of sabah and sarawak and the rights and special privileges for the malays and bumiputera as guaranteed in the federal constitution he told reporters at the parliament lobby today mmstorymreg2 the kubang kerian mp was commenting on the gathering of nongovernmental organisations against icerd ratification outside the parliament building this morning pas president datuk seri abdul hadi awang led a group of 10 delegates submitted the memorandum of protest to a representative at the prime ministers department on october 24 minister in the prime ministers department p waytha moorthy was reported to have said that the government was committed to ratify the icerd and five other treaties on human rights as early as the first quarter of next year prime minister tun dr mahathir mohamad said today that the government would only ratify icerd after negotiations with all the races bernama"

"by david millikin sydney afp australia downgraded the great barrier reefs longterm outlook to very poor for the first time as the world heritage site struggles with escalating climate change in its latest fiveyearly report on the health of the worlds largest coral reef system the governments great barrier reef marine park authority singled out rising sea temperatures as the biggest threat to the giant organism the significant and largescale impacts from recordbreaking sea surface temperatures have resulted in coral reef habitat transitioning from poor to very poor condition the government agency said climate change is escalating and is the most significant threat to the regions longterm outlook significant global action to address climate change is critical to slowing deterioration of the reefs ecosystem and heritage values and supporting recovery it said but the agency added that the threats to the 2300kilometre 1400mile reef were multiple cumulative and increasing and in addition to warming seas included agricultural runoff and coraleating crown of thorns starfish the agency said the outlook downgrade from poor in 2014 to very poor now reflected the greater expanse of coral deterioration across the massive reef notably following backtoback coral bleaching events caused by sea temperature spikes in 2016 and 2017 the window of opportunity to improve the reefs longterm future is now it said the conservative australian government has faced criticism from environmentalists for favouring an expansion of its massive coal mining and export industry over action to curb climate change fridays reef report coincided with the release of new government data showing that australias emissions of greenhouse gases blamed for climate change continued a fouryear rising trend during the first half of 2019 the government insists it is meeting its emissions targets as set under international protocols including the paris climate agreement and argues that australias total greenhouse gas output remains far below that of major polluting nations this report calls out climate change as the biggest threat to the reef environment minister sussan ley acknowledged at the release of the outlook report but she added we are taking the action that were required to do under our paris agreements environmentalists said the latest reef outlook put new pressure on prime minister scott morrison over his support for expanding production of coal australias biggest export australia must do its fair share in the global effort to tackle climate pollution that means moving on from digging up and burning coal and gas for our energy said kelly oshanassy ceo of the australian conservation foundation the united nations had asked to receive the latest update on the reefs health by december so that it can determine whether the site can retain its world heritage status when unesco next considers the issue in 2020 the reef is estimated to be worth at least us4 billion a year to the australian economy serving as a magnet for tourists and emblem of the country ian poiner chairman of the great barrier reef marine park authority said that the reef remains vibrant beautiful and it is still resilient however coral reefs globally are declining including the great barrier reef and we know why the reason is climate change impacts that require a global response"

"cyberjaya oct 31 the communications and multimedia consumer forum of malaysia cfm said it received 3266 complaints on matters ranging from billing to broadband service between january and september this year cfm chairman mohamad yusrizal yusoff told bernama after its 17th annual general meeting today that billing disputes were among the highest followed by grievances on service disruptiondowntime highspeed broadband service and poor 4glte coverage he said pricerelated complaints saw a significant increase since august from 13 to 64 complaints in september the increase followed the price reduction in fixed broadband calledfor by communications and multimedia minister gobind singh deo and implemented through the mandatory standard on access pricing msap in june according to yusrizal several services providers have already complied but cfm will continue to monitor the situation he advised consumers to do their research before committing to a service and not just go for the cheapest price some 86 per cent of the 3266 complaints were resolved in less than 15 days in accordance with the general consumer code of practice for the communications and multimedia industry malaysia gcc he said adding the cfm is also working on bettering the amount of days it takes to solve a problem yusrizal said that compared to the same period last year there was a reduction in grievances because consumers were also complaining to the malaysian communications and multimedia commission mcmc he said cfm has asked mcmc to allow cfm to handle the complaints alone because many prefer this arrangement therefore cfm is working on improving its complaints channel and structure which will be introduced in december in the meantime consumers can submit complaints to httpsaduanskmmgovmy via the my mobile rights app or by visiting cfm in cyberjaya selangor"

"umno online laman berita rasmi pertubuhan kebangsaan melayu bersatu atau umno rantau 31 ogos timbalan presiden umno datuk seri mohamad hasan berkata piagam penyatuan ummah ini adalah rangka kerja terhadap penubuhan jawatankuasa sekiranya ada apaapa berlaku katanya apabila piagam kerjasama ini dimeterai pada 14 september segala slogan penyatuan ummah ini akan ditukar dan menampakkan lagi inklusif kerana ia melibatkan semua bangsa yang ada di negara ini selepas ini tidak dipanggil penyatuan ummah dan ia akan lebih inklusif dipanggil satu yang merangkumi semua dan termasuk juga orang yang bukan islam kalau nak buat ini kenalah buat secara bersama dan jangan tinggalkan antara satu sama lain kita cuma buat deklarasi sahaja dan piagam itu sebagai mercu tanda piagam ini merupakan tatakelola kerja untuk kita meneruskan agenda penyatuan ummah ini katanya semasa ceramah penyatuan ummah peringkat negeri sembilan di eco park kuala sawah rantau pada hari ini di sini beliau menambah pembentukan kerajaan perpaduan itu penting bagi menunjukkan kesepakatan kerjasama yang jitu antara keduadua parti orang melayu terbesar sebelum menghadapi pilihan raya umum pru ke15 tambahnya umno dan pas mampu memberi ancaman besar kepada pakatan harapan ph sekiranya kerajaan pada masa sekarang gagal menangani isuisu semasa yang berlaku dengan bijaksana kerjasama umno dan pas bukannya baru tetapi dulu sudah pernah berlaku cuma hanya bertahan lima tahun selepas itu ketiadaan allahyarham tun abdul razak dan allahyarham datuk asri katanya penyatuan dulu dibuat atas persefahaman bersama dan tidak sampai ke akar umbi tidak ada penerangan sehingga sampai ke peringkat bawah cuma peringkat pemimpin pusat sahaja kesukaran ini berlaku kerana mereka tidak memahaminya selama ini umno dan pas berseteru tibatiba bercantum tanpa asbab musabab yang perlu ditelan dan mentelaahnya jadi ianya tidak dapat bertahan lama kerana dulunya persefahaman ini berasaskan 100 peratus kepada asas politik apabila kita simpul ikatan ini atas asas agama dan bangsa insyaallah kita tidak ada apaapa keperluan untuk kita mengesyaki bahawa ikatan berasaskan agama dan bangsa ini boleh terlerai melainkan kita mengkhianati agama kita sendiri ataupun bangsa kita jelasnya sekiranya pemimpinpemimpin lama sudah tiada maka pemimpinpemimpin bawah akan teruskan penyatuan ini dan bukannya berasaskan kepada pemimpin atau politik tapi penyatuan ini untuk memastikan kesinambungan mengikut perlembagaan persekutuan ini yang saya nak tekankan dan lakukan di seluruh negara dan saya ingin beratkan di setiap kawasan kita akan menerangkan dan akar umbi akan memahami asas penyatuan ini yang bukan sangat kepada politik umno online"

"kuantan pengumuman kelulusan tapak pelupusan kekal pdf sisa pemprosesan nadir bumi yang dikatakan dibina di bukit ketam di sini sepatutnya diumumkan kerajaan negeri bukan lynas malaysia sdn bhd lynas ahli parlimen kuantan fuziah salleh berkata dalam isu pembinaan pdf terbabit sebarang keputusan perlu diumumkan oleh kerajaan pahang bagaimanapun timbalan menteri di jabatan perdana menteri itu berkata setakat ini kerajaan negeri masih belum memberikan kenyataan atau pengesahan bahawa pdf itu akan dibina di bukit ketam dalam soal kelulusan tanah dan tapak pembinaan pdf perlu dikenalpasti oleh kerajaan pahang sebelum kebenaran diberikan lynas pula bukannya kerajaan yang boleh membuat pengumuman kelulusan tapak terbabit hingga menimbulkan kebimbangan orang ramai berhubung pembinaan tapak berkenaan katanya pada sidang media selepas majlis jamuan dan sambutan tahun baru cina peringkat parlimen kuantan di sini hari ini yang turut hadir ahli dewan undangan negeri adun teruntum sim chon siang sehubungan itu fuziah yang juga timbalan menteri di jabatan perdana menteri berkata kajian lebih terperinci perlu dilakukan bagi mengenal pasti impak terhadap orang ramai dan alam sekitar beliau bimbang kerana tapak pdf di bukit ketam itu dikatakan terletak dalam kawasan tadahan air iaitu dekat sungai riau sungai riau pula ada muka sauk untuk loji rawatan air bukit kuantan dan penduduk sekitar felda bukit goh mendapatkan sumber bekalan daripada loji terbabit katanya kelmarin media melaporkan lynas mengumumkan pdf di bukit ketam yang terletak berhampiran sempadan pahang dan terengganu direka bentuk untuk menyimpan sisa pembersihan pelunturan air wlp daripada operasinya pada ogos lalu kementerian tenaga sains teknologi alam sekitar dan perubahan iklim melanjutkan lesen operasi kilang lynas di kawasan perindustrian gebeng selama enam bulan bersama tiga syarat syarat terbabit termasuk mengenal pasti tapak pembinaan pdf dengan kebenaran bertulis daripada kerajaan negeri serta mengemukakan kebenaran rasmi bertulis daripada pihak berkuasa negara lain untuk membawa keluar sisa buangan wlp ke negara terbabit sebelum ini kerajaan pahang juga mengesahkan sedang meneliti dan menilai kesesuaian kemudahan pdf iaitu dalam proses mengenal pasti kesesuaian lokasi yang dicadangkan oleh lynas sebelum diberikan kebenaran permohonan lynas itu juga dirujuk kepada agensi berkaitan termasuk lembaga perlesenan tenaga atom lpta bagi mengenal pasti tapak terbabit"
"kuala lumpur grab has reminded all of its ehailing and delivery drivers as well as riders in the country to remain vigilant and adopt utmost personal hygiene in the wake of the novel coronavirus 2019ncov outbreak the company has also issued a circular to its drivers and riders apart from staff members to take precautionary steps as per the guideline by the health ministry in preventing the spread of the virus in light of the 2019ncov situation grab has put in place measures and raised our level of preparedness in addressing potential incidents within the country we are also reaching out to local authorities and are ready to provide support to help reduce the transmission of the virus driver and delivery partners have also been reminded to wear a mask while ferrying passengers or delivering food orders as well as to seek immediate medical attention if they are feeling unwell said a grab spokesperson meanwhile drivers and staff who had visited china recently are advised to monitor their health closely for two weeks upon their return to malaysia they are also advised to seek medical attention promptly if they feel unwell our customers partners and employees wellbeing are of utmost importance to us and we will continue to monitor the situation closely and adjust our response accordingly to address the developments new straits timesnew straits times press m bhda part of media prima group"

ia adalah tahun di mana malaysia memperkenalkan wawasan 2020 barangkali antara segelintir negara di dunia ini pada masa itu yang mempunyai pandangan jauh kehadapan melangkaui pelan lima tahun yang biasa divgptad15671374050220 pada masa itu wawasan 2020 adalah perkataan yang sangat popular dan menjadi perhatian ramai memandangkan ia berkenaan dengan hala tuju yang bakal ditempa malaysia pada masa depan dan sebagai pelajar semasa era itu selain sibuk mengira usia masingmasing dalam tempoh 29 tahun lagi dan menghafal maksud wawasan 2020 bagi peperiksaan ramai daripada kita membayangkan ruang angkasa negara pada masa itu bakal dipenuhi dengan kereta terbang dan bangunan pencakar langit seperti yang dilihat dalam filem seperti star trek dan star wars divgptad15560888824570 negara dan rakyat bersamasama meraikan gagasan masa depan itu yang merupakan ilham daripada perdana menteri pada masa itu dan juga sekarang tun dr mahathir mohamad wawasan itu yang mengandungi sembilan cabaran memberikan semangat untuk berusaha ke arah mencapai matlamat yang sama dan memberikan kekuatan semangat diri yang diperlukan golongan muda malaysia pada masa itu untuk bergerak melangkah ke era baharu hampir tiga dekad kemudiannya walaupun malaysia masih belum lagi menjadi sebuah negara maju mahupun mencapai sasaran pertumbuhan atau menangani beberapa cabaran yang disasarkan di bawah wawasan 2020 namun ia kekal menjadi sebuah negara yang terus berkembang maju dengan peluang yang besar dari perspektif ekonomi negara berjaya mengharungi cabaran getir krisis kewangan asia pada 1997 dan krisis kewangan global pada 2008 hasil daripada langkah bank negara malaysia bnm yang menyediakan sistem yang teguh dan mampu bertahan daripada kejutan ekonomi sejak 2000 pertumbuhan keluaran dalam negara kasar kdnk sebenar malaysia berada pada purata 55 peratus manakala pendapatan perkapita sebenar berkembang hampir 6 peratus setahun kadar yang membanggakan memandangkan pelbagai cabaran yang terpaksa dihadapi negara selama bertahuntahun ekonomi negara dijangka berkembang pantas sedikit pada 48 peratus pada 2020 daripada 47 peratus yang diunjurkan bagi 2019 meskipun faktor luaran yang tidak menentu seperti perang perdagangan malaysia juga kekal sebagai antara negara yang paling mesra perniagaan selain sentiasa meningkatkan kemajuan sektor pembuatan pertanian dan perkhidmatan malaysia juga bergerak seiring dengan era ekonomi dan teknologi disruptif walaupun pada kadar yang perlahan era telefon talian tetap dan jam analog kini telah berakhir perkhidmatan perbankan tempahan kereta atau makanan kini boleh dilakukan di hujung jari sahaja siapa sangka suatu hari nanti akan ada bank tanpa kehadiran fizikal langsung tidak lama lagi sehingga lima lesen mungkin akan dikeluarkan kepada pemohon yang layak untuk menubuhkan bank digital bagi menawarkan sama ada perniagaan perbankan konvensional atau islam mereka di malaysia meskipun masih baharu ekonomi digital dijangka menyumbang lebih daripada 21 peratus kepada kdnk negara pada 2022 berbanding 185 peratus pada 2018 tetapi itu adalah perspektif keseluruhannya di tahap yang lebih terperinci diperhatikan bahawa dividen pertumbuhan negara tidak diagihkan secara mencukupi ke semua segmen masyarakat ekonomi yang berkembang pantas dan perubahan landskap keperluan pekerjaan nampaknya telah mewujudkan pecahan sosial asas dasar yang dibina malaysia masyarakat pelbagai bangsa budaya dan pelbagai bahasa kos sara hidup merupakan antara isu paling penting justeru sistem pendidikan perlu bermanfaat pada masa depan kerana peningkatan produktiviti dan menambah baik pendidikan dalam meningkatkan paras pendapatan adalah penting untuk pendekatan lebih mampan bagi menangani isu kos hidup malaysia masih berada di bawah purata pertubuhan kerjasama dan pembangunan ekonomi oecd dalam matematik bacaan dan sains pengetahuan yang amat diperlukan untuk membangunkan sebuah negara yang lebih baik malaysia juga sudah mencapai kemajuan besar dalam menambah baik tadbir urus dan membasmi kemiskinan selain sistem pendidikannya yang masih boleh ditambah baik bekas ketua tabung kewangan antarabangsa imf christine lagarde semasa lawatan beliau ke malaysia pada jun 2019 berkata pelaburan dalam pendidikan berkualiti tinggi boleh mengurangkan ketidakpadanan kepakaran menaikkan gaji dan membantu malaysia memanfaatkan potensi teknologi baharu kerajaan barubaru ini telah melancarkan wawasan kemakmuran bersama 2030 wkb 2030 yang mengambil alih daripada wawasan 2020 dengan sasaran utama menyusun semula ekonomi berintensifkan buruh kemahiran rendah negara kepada ekonomi berasaskan pengetahuan yang akan menyediakan standard kehidupan baik kepada semua rakyat malaysia ada akhir dekad ini bernama"

"george town aug as today marks the final day before the implementation of the sales and service tax sst consumers are seen leaving a supermarket with items bought in bulks a check by bernama at penang gama supermarket found that the premises was already filled with shoppers queueing up to the cashier counters even during the first few hours of opening hours with most of their shopping carts and trolleys filled with raw and processed food and drinks toiletries and cleaning products a man who was in a rush outside of the cashier counter had brought along two aides to help with his shopping three shopping carts filled with cartons of crackers instant noodles and soda which cost him rm when approached he said he did not normally purchase that quantity of items but was concerned that the price of the goods would increase with the implementation of sst tomorrow gama marketing division senior manager leong hau soon said implementation of sst would unlikely cause a huge rise in the price of goods and that general goods such as sanitary pads and also daily food items like rice cooking and bread were exempted from the tax on the huge crowd of shoppers buying in bulk in anticipation of an increase in the price of goods tomorrow she said it was because they shoppers did not know the items that would be affected by sst the list of items that will have its price increased will only be released tomorrow by the authorities she said she also attributed today s large crowd to the friday discount on certain goods offered by the supermarket on friday and also because of the three day merdeka promotion sale as well as today being a public holiday bernama"

"kuala lumpur umno delegates at the partys general assembly have demanded the party leadership to give a clearer explanation on its political cooperation with other parties especially pas in his maiden presidential address umno president datuk seri dr ahmad zahid hamidi said the partys doors were open for cooperation with any political party as long as this did not require trading off its principles selangor umno representative datuk megat zulkarnain omardin said it was good that zahid had said that umno will work with parties in the opposition bloc in the spirit of cooperation for a common interest but more explanations are needed he said if there was no clear direction about what the party is doing those at the bottom will be confused he added that umno must take stern action against turncoats those elected representatives who broke away from the party after winning seats under its ticket federal territories representative tun faisal ismail aziz said the party president and supreme council must explain the partys stand to avoid confusion and misinterpretation among umno members he said the umno supreme council had decided to boycott the port dickson byelection but they the leaders need to explain to members whether this meant that the party would still help pas campaign when debating the presidential address today he said political agreements must come with clear guidelines that it will benefit the party and the struggle to defend religion race and the nation tun faisal said in the matter of political consensus with other parties umno must also study the status of quota seats so that it will benefit umno and the opposition bloc he urged the party leadership to go on the ground often to meet the people to restore confidence in umno the president and supreme council members must immediately go out and explain the partys direction to the grassroots said tun faisal exclusive stories"

"kuala lumpur oct 31 g neptune bhds external auditor messrs moore stephens associates plt has issued a statement of material uncertainty related to going concern on the ace marketlisted companys financial statements for the financial year ended june 30 2018 fy18 in a filing with bursa malaysia today g neptune said moore stephens in its independent auditors report dated oct 12 revealed that it was unable to obtain sufficient appropriate audit evidence on the groups outstanding loan payables and accrued interest amounting to rm106 million and rm549923 respectively in addition the group had provided an amount of rm297904 for crystallisation of corporate guarantee granted to its subsidiary we were unable to obtain sufficient appropriate audit evidence to confirm the accuracy of the carrying amount stated or whether any further liabilities are required to be provided in the financial statements in relation to these loan payables as we were unable to obtain external confirmations from the lenders noted moore stephens the guidance note 3 gn3 company had incurred net losses of rm521192 for fy18 and had deficit in shareholders equity of rm305 million its current liabilities exceeded its current assets by rm305 million the information technology solution services companyhas also ceased its operations and recorded no revenue during the financial year despite its dormant status g neptune said it continues to monitor its financial position to mitigate any risks that may arise most notable in the groups balance sheet would be the rm28 million in payables the bulk comprising loans taken by hong kongbased subsidiary geranium ltd the board of directors is in communication with the lenders to work out a solution on the matter it added g neptune also said it is currently evaluating its options to formulate a regularisation plan to address its gn3 status it is required to submit its regularisation plan to the relevant authorities by nov 30 this year the ability of the group to continue as going concern is dependent on the formalisation and successful implementation of the regularisation plan of the group to restore its financial position and achieving sustainable and viable operations the group is still in the process of evaluating its option to formulate a plan to regularise its financial condition and will make the necessary announcement on the same in accordance with the requirements under gn3 it added g neptune shares were untraded today it last closed at 7 sen on oct 30 with a market capitalisation of rm1876 million"

hmetro20190401hilang bot terbalik di sungaihttpswwwhmetrocommymutakhir201903439503hilangbotterbalikdisungai hanya dua rakannya berjaya berenang ke tepi manakala masri yang berada di belakang hilang dari pandangan kata muhazar abu samah 47 bapa saudara kepada masri ahmad 38 yang dikhuatiri lemas di pengkalan kota kampung durian condong muar hari ini dalam kejadian 10 pagi keinginan tiga sahabat memancing udang galah berakhir tragedi apabila seorang daripada mereka dikhuatiri lemas selepas bot gentian dinaiki mereka terbalik kejadian itu mengakibatkan usaha mencari dan menyelamat sar mangsa dilakukan pelbagai agensi termasuk jabatan bomba dan penyelamat malaysia jbpm polis diraja malaysia pdrm dan angkatan pertahanan awam malaysia apm muhazar berkata dia yang tinggal di melaka mengetahui kejadian itu melalui ahli keluarganya yang menetap di kawasan terbabit pada 12 tengah hari saya difahamkan masri bersama dua rakannya pergi ke kawasan terbabit yang juga lubuk udang galah pada malam tadi dia yang bertolak dari kuala lumpur bermalam di rumah ibu saudaranya sebelum memancing udang di kawasan itu pada 9 pagi katanya ketika dihubungi selepas melihat sar pada petang ini menurutnya kejadian berlaku apabila bot gentian dinaiki tiga sahabat itu hilang imbangan sebelum terbalik katanya dalam keadaan cemas mereka berenang ke tepi namun ketika dua rakannya tiba di tepi kelibat masri tidak kelihatan dan dipercayai lemas seorang ahli keluarga kami menyelam bagi mencarinya di kawasan kirakira 100 meter dari lokasi kejadian namun tidak membuahkan hasil mangsa bekerja sebagai juruteknik di lapangan terbang subang baru saja menghadiri majlis perkahwinan sepupunya di pantai dalam kuala lumpur semalam katanya beliau berkata pada majlis perkahwinan sepupunya itu dia dilihat kurang sihat kerana demam katanya mangsa dikatakan tidak mahu pergi memancing tetapi terpaksa mengikut rakannya mencari udang galah di lubuk sungai itu sementara itu jurucakap bomba berkata seorang pegawai bersama lima anggota dikejarkan ke lokasi sebaik menerima panggilan pada 1024 pagi maklumat awal diterima menyatakan terdapat sebuah bot gentian terbalik di kawasan sungai dua orang berjaya menyelamatkan diri manakala seorang lagi hilang dan dikhuatiri lemas katanya katanya operasi awal dilakukan pasukan bbp bukit gambir menggunakan kaedah pencarian di kawasan permukaan "airasia officials have strongly denied any wrongdoing in connection with the 2012 sponsorship agreement between the caterham formula 1 racing team and airbus then parent eads reuters picparis feb 1 airbus bribed public officials and hid the payments as part of a pattern of worldwide corruption prosecutors said yesterday as the european planemaker agreed a record us4 billion rm163 billion settlement with france britain and the united states dfpdisplayslot the disclosures made public after a nearly fouryear investigation spanning sales to more than a dozen overseas markets came as courts on both sides of the atlantic formally approved settlements that lift a legal cloud that has hung over europes largest aerospace group for years dfpdisplayslotmmstoryoutstream it was a pervasive and pernicious bribery scheme in various divisions of airbus se that went on for a number of years us district judge thomas hogan said the deal effectively a corporate plea bargain means airbus has avoided criminal prosecution that would have risked it being barred from public contracts in the united states and european union a massive blow for a major defence and space supplier dfpdisplayslotmmstorymreg2 prosecutors said individuals could still face criminal charges however dfpdisplayslotmmteads airbus whose shares closed down 1 per cent has been investigated by french and british authorities for alleged corruption over jet sales dating back more than a decade it has also faced us inquiries over suspected violations of us export controls in reaching this agreement today we are helping airbus to turn the page definitively on corrupt past practices french prosecutor jeanfrancois bohnert said frances financial prosecutor said the company had also agreed to three years light compliance monitoring by the countrys anticorruption agency the us department of justice said the deal was the largest ever foreign bribery settlement code name van gogh in a packed hearing at londons royal courts of justice an airbus lawyer said the settlements draw a clear line under the investigation and under the grave historic practices outlining detailed findings the uks serious fraud office sfo said airbus had hired the wife of a sri lankan airlines executive as its intermediary and misled britains ukef export credit agency over her name and gender while paying us2 million to her company the airline could not be reached for comment on defence deals airbus hired and disguised payments to a close relative of a government official in ghana with no aerospace experience in connection with a sale of military transport planes the sfo said ghanas government could not immediately be reached court filings in britain and the united states outlined efforts to keep relationships and payments secret including the use of code names such as van gogh and payments described as medications and dosages prescribed by dr brown the sfo said airbus sponsored a sports team owned by airasia executives while negotiating airplane orders airasia officials have strongly denied any wrongdoing in connection with the 2012 sponsorship agreement between the caterham formula 1 racing team and airbus then parent eads airasia could not immediately be reached for comment the british investigation also identified bribery allegations involving taiwans transasia airways garuda indonesia and citilink indonesia garuda and citilink did not immediately respond to requests for comment transasia went bankrupt in 2018 the us court documents outlined bribery and lavish hospitality involving plane sales to china network of middlemen french and us prosecutors said the settlement covered airbus only as a company and any current or former employees involved in related crimes could still be open to prosecution with this settlement weve completed a first phase we are now going to have to examine individual responsibilities french prosecutor bohnert told reporters the uks sfo last year abandoned attempts to prosecute individuals following what was then a record bribery settlement with engine maker rollsroyce in 2017 at the centre of the airbus case was a decadesold system of thirdparty sales agents run from a nowdisbanded headquarters unit that at its height involved some 250 people and several hundreds of millions of euros of payments a year sources familiar with the matter have said airbus has said it halted payments in 2014 after discovering false statements on the use of agents to britains export credit agency and later took its findings to uk authorities an internal investigation which racked up legal bills of around 100 million euros a year led to a boarddriven clearout of top management and plunged airbus into years of selfexamination hampering its sales efforts the probe also triggered an internal row over responsibility for lapses with airbus employees insisting they had no control over the choice of agents or offset deals handled under a separate entity eads the former airbus parent company others say the system whose roots go back decades to an era when payments to win deals were tolerated and taxdeductible was an open secret in the company and french political circles where it was intertwined with influencebuilding abroad reuters"

"kuala kangsar 28 feb yang dipertua majlis perbandaran kuala kangsar mpkk datuk shahrom abdul malik gambar yang akan bersara wajib awal bulan mac ini gembira kerana pihak berkuasa tempatan itu mencapai taraf lima bintang dalam memberi khidmat kepada masyarakat menurutnya pengiktirafan itu tidak mudah dicapai jika tiada kerjasama dengan semua pihak dan dalam masa sama pihaknya menyokong idea baharu bagi meningkatkan perkhidmatan mpkk beliau berkata pihaknya mengalualukan apa juga pandangan untuk mempertingkatkan mutu perkhidmatan dari segi kebersihan landskap ruang niaga dan kediaman perumahan saya mula berkhidmat sebagai setiausaha mpkk pada tahun 80an dan menjadi ydp pada 2013 jadi saya sinonim dengan warga kuala kangsar dan rakanrakan yang menjalankan tugas saya terhutang kepada semua pihak yang membantu mencapai kejayaan mendapat pengiktirafan yang bermakna ini katanya dalam majlis apresiasi mpkk anugerah perkhidmatan cemerlang meraikan pesara dan majlis jasamu dikenang majlis perpisahan yang dipertua mpkk di sini hari ini majlis dirasmikan timbalan setiausaha kerajaan negeri zulazlan abu hassan yang turut hadir ahli dewan undangan negeri adun chenderoh datuk zainun mat noor adun lubuk nerbau dr jurij jalaludin adun manong mohd zuraimi razali dan pegawai daerah ahmad munir ishah shahrom berkata antara peristiwa yang tidak dapat dilupakan sepanjang berkhidmat di mpkk ialah banjir besar yang melanda bandar ini pada september 2014 katanya bencana alam itu memusnahkan banyak kemudahan awam di tepi sungai perak dan di kawasan bandar selain itu saya tidak boleh melupakan persiapan untuk istiadat pertabalan sultan perak sultan nazrin muizzuddin shah pada mei 2015 katanya"
hmetro20190902asah bakat dalam pengucapan awamhttpswwwhmetrocommymutakhir201909491955asahbakatdalampengucapanawam dalam usaha melahirkan generasi masa hadapan yang lebih berketrampilan majlis agama islam wilayah persekutuan maiwp menganjurkan pertandingan bahas ala parlimen piala maiwp peringkat wilayah persekutuan 2019 pertandingan bahas yang julung kali diadakan dengan kerjasama jabatan pendidikan wilayah persekutuan jpwp kuala lumpur itu mengangkat konsep atau gagasan rahmatan lil alamin sebagai tema perbahasan pengerusinya datuk seri syed hussien alhabshee berkata penyertaan terbuka kepada pelajar sekolah menengah di wilayah persekutuan putrajaya dan labuan kami percaya pertandingan ini akan menjadi medium terbaik untuk peserta berbahas mengenai nilai sejagat terutamaa kasih sayang dan saling hormat menghormati sesama insan secara sihat menerusinya kami yakin ia mampu mengasah bakat pelajar dalam bidang pengucapan awam dan ini antara wadah untuk meningkatkan daya fikir intelektual serta pemikiran kritis mereka pelajar bukan islam juga digalak menyertai pertandingan ini supaya samasama membahaskan nilai sejagat kerana kita ingin tekankan nilai gagasan ini kepada pelajar berbilang kaum dan agama katanya ketika ditemui selepas majlis pelancaran pertandingan itu di sini hadir sama ketua pegawai eksekutif maiwp datuk abdul aziz jusoh dan pengarah pendidikan jpwp kuala lumpur maznah abu bakar abdul aziz berkata pertandingan seumpama itu selari dengan agenda maiwp dalam memperkasa sosio ekonomi ummah bukan sahaja melalui aktiviti pengurusan zakat bahkan menerusi pelbagai aktiviti pendidikan maiwp memperuntukkan hampir 20 peratus daripada jumlah zakat diterima bagi merangka pelbagai program pendidikan dan tahun lalu kami belanjakan rm667 juta untuk tujuan itu katanya sementara itu 24 sekolah menengah di sekitar wilayah persekutuan kuala lumpur putrajaya dan labuan bersetuju menyertai pertandingan itu dengan anggaran kirakira 96 peserta bakal berentap merebut kejuaraan pertandingan peringkat saringan bermula pada 10 dan 11 september ini sebelum pasukan terbaik yang terpilih ke peringkat akhir pada 9 dan 10 oktober 2019 juara bakal membawa pulang wang tunai rm5000 beserta piala pusingan dan sijil penyertaan manakala naib juara rm3000 dan tempat ketiga rm100032017sosioekonomimemperkasa
"arau parents are now prohibited from registering their newborn children with names that have more than 80 letters when announcing the matter today national registration department nrd deputy directorgeneral operations jasri kasim said the longest name in the nrds records so far had four words and a total of 78 letters the nrd also does not encourage parents to give their children names with unpleasant meaning he said when met at the nrd mobile convoy programme here furthermore he said short forms of names would no longer be allowed such as abd and mohd which must now be spelled in full as abdul and mohamad at the event jasri also presented the malaysian citizenship certificate to thai descendant muniroh tehpooyoo 35 who is the wife of civil servant mohd fauzi ku abdullah 38 at kampung behor mali simpang empat muniroh who married her husband in 2003 applied for the certificate two years ago bernama exclusive stories"

thesundaily20191130azmin among 20 pkr leaders who object to zakarias sackinghttpswwwthesundailymylocalazminamong20pkrleaderswhoobjecttozakariassackingaj1685604kuala lumpur twenty of the pkrs central committee mpp members including its deputy president datuk seri mohamed azmin ali pix have rejected the sacking of zakaria abdul hamid as mpp member in a memo to pkr disciplinary board they said the decision to sack zakaria was flawed and not in accordance with the principle of justice as it did not go through due process the disciplinary board only recommended a show cause not dismissal it said according to the memo which was made available to the media today this was strengthened by a public statement from the malaysian anticorruption commission macc who explained that their side had erred with regards to the notifications to the partys disciplinary board on the matter pkr vicepresidents zuraida kamaruddin and tian chua are also part of the group mentioned in the memo the others are wanita chief haniza mohamed talha angkatan muda keadilan deputy chief hilman idham wanita deputy chief dr daroyah alwi and mpp members amiruddin shaari datuk mohd rashid hasnon r sivarasa rahimah majid elizabeth wong datuk saifuddin abdullah radzlan jalaluddin datuk dr mansor othman datuk kamarudin jaffar azmizam zaman huri gan pei nei hee loy sian datuk seri r santhara kumar serta zakaria sendiri meanwhile pkrs disciplinary board chairman datuk ahmad kassim said they would look into the memo during its meeting before making recommendations to the mpp the decision to sack made by the mpp and not from the disciplinary board or partys president any amendment and revision to the decision must be made during the mpps meeting thus i appeal to those who had signed the memo to attend and defend their views in the upcoming meeting he said in a statement in a response to the memo bernama 46050 petaling jaya selangor malaysia tel 6037784 6688 fax 6037785 2624 6037785 2625642politikpkr
"polis berjaya menumpaskan sindiket menjual sijil cuti sakit palsu mc susulan penahanan enam orang termasuk dalang utamanya ketua polis kuala lumpur datuk seri mazlan lazim berkata kegiatan itu terbongkar selepas menerima laporan daripada seorang wanita yang bekerja sebagai penolong pegawai tadbir di sebuah pejabat kesihatan daerah pengadu menyatakan ada menerima surat pengesahan dari hospital ampang berkaitan sijil cuti sakit kerajaan yang dikeluarkan kepada kakitangan mereka adalah palsu pihak hospital mengesahkan tidak pernah mengeluarkan sijil sakit berkenaan dan tiada rekod menunjukkan kakitangan berkenaan mendapatkan rawatan di hospital ampang pada tarikh dinyatakan katanya ketika sidang media di ibu pejabat polis kontinjen ipk kuala lumur hari ini mazlan berkata siasatan awal terhadap kakitangan itu mendapatinya membeli sijil cuti sakit berkenaan pada harga rm25 daripada pihak ketiga menurutnya bertindak atas laporan polis yang diterima dan hasil maklumat risikan sepasukan pegawai dan anggota bahagian risikan operasi bahagian siasatan jenayah komersial ibu pejabat polis daerah ipd sentul membuat tangkapan terhadap lima lelaki dan seorang wanita berusia 27 hingga 42 tahun di sekitar ibu negara dan selangor pada minggu lalu hasil pemeriksaan yang dijalankan terhadap suspek kediaman dan premis percetakan kemudiannya berjaya merampas beberapa barangan antara yang dirampas itu ialah 216 pelbagai jenis cop doktor klinik swasta dan kerajaan 4631 keping mc klinik dan hospital kerajaan 257 buku sijil mc bersama buku resit rasmi klinik swasta lima unit telefon bimbit satu set komputer dan satu unit cakera keras mudah alih katanya mazlan berkata modus operandi digunakan sindiket berkenaan dengan dua ahli sindiket bertindak sebagai orang tengah dan akan menerima tempahan daripada pembeli melalui panggilan telefon serta hanya boleh diperoleh melalui kenalan yang pernah mendapatkan perkhidmatan mereka selepas menerima tempahan orang tengah itu akan berurusan dengan suspek ketiga yang bertindak sebagai penjual mc untuk klinik swasta sekiranya tempahan pembeli membabitkan mc hospital atau klinik kerajaan suspek ketiga akan berurusan dengan serang lagi ahli sindiket selaku penjual mc kerajaan katanya difahamkan mc palsu itu dijual kepada orang tengah dengan harga rm10 hingga rm15 sekeping bergantung kepada jumlah tempahan yang diterima mc palsu yang sudah siap itu akan diserahkan kepada pembeli oleh orang tengah secara bersemuka dan mereka itu dipercayai menjalankan kegiatan terbabit sejak lapan bulan lalu dua suspek dibebaskan dengan jaminan polis manakala empat lagi akan disambung reman selepas tamat tempoh reman hari ini kes disiasat mengikut seksyen 420 kanun keseksaan dan jika sabit kesalahan boleh dihukum penjara tidak kurang setahun dan tidak melebihi 10 tahun dengan sebatan dan denda katanya"

masingmasing empat dirawat di hospital sungai buloh tiga di hospital permai johor dan seorang di hospital sultanah maliha langkawi adalah semuanya warga china"
"kuala lumpur pelaksanaan cukai jualan dan perkhidmatan sst mulai sabtu ini dijangka tidak membawa perbezaan ketara bagi harga perkhidmatan pakar cukai norsa adah ahmad berkata ini kerana cukai enam peratus yang dikenakan untuk perkhidmatan seperti hotel insurans dan takaful serta penyediaan makanan dan minuman adalah sama dengan nilai cukai yang dikenakan semasa pelaksanaan cukai barang dan perkhidmatan gst sebelum ini sepatutnya harga perkhidmatan tidak banyak berbeza dengan yang sebelum ini kebanyakannya akan kekal seperti biasa berbanding kesannya sst terhadap harga barang yang menjadi tumpuan orang ramai mahu lihat sama ada harga turun atau naik harga perkhidmatan dijangka tidak mendatangkan kesan ketara katanya kepada bernama googletag display namun norsa adah yang juga anggota institut akauntan malaysia mia tidak menolak kemungkinan berlaku caj berganda pada harga makanan dan minuman yang dijual di sesebuah restoran menurutnya harga sesuatu produk seperti minuman tin dikenakan cukai jualan peratus pada peringkat pengeluaran dan tidak mustahil bagi pihak restoran untuk menaikkan harga bagi menampung kos cukai perkhidmatan antara perkhidmatan yang turut dikenakan sst adalah kelab malam kelab persendirian kelab golf kasino loteri telekomunikasi televisyen berbayar guaman perakaunan ejen kastam arkitek jurutera penilai keselamatan parkir kereta sewa pengiklanan perkhidmatan domestik perkhidmatan teknologi maklumat kad kredit dan elektrik penggiat industri perhotelan turut menjangka tiada kenaikan harga bilik dengan pelaksanaan sst kecuali kenaikan biasa pada musim puncak seperti cuti sekolah disebabkan permintaan tinggi bagaimanapun pengarah eksekutif persatuan pemilik hotel malaysia maho shaharudin m saaid berkata sekiranya mekanisme pelaksanaan cukai itu sama seperti sst sebelum ini pihaknya menjangka kadar bayaran bilik lebih murah sekiranya mekanisme sama seperti sst sebelum gst dilaksanakan harga bilik sepatutnya jadi lebih murah kerana sst tidak mengenakan enam peratus cukai pada caj perkhidmatan katanya menurutnya semasa gst dilaksanakan cukai enam peratus itu turut dikenakan ke atas caj perkhidmatan yang menyebabkan kenaikan harga bilik dan perkhidmatan lain bagaimanapun shaharudin berharap mekanisme pelaksanaan sst yang baharu itu akan segera dijelaskan kepada pihak hotel untuk mengelakkan sebarang kekeliruan kami sedang menunggu penjelasan daripada jabatan kastam diraja malaysia katanya bernama"
"kuala lumpur 31 jan premis maktab turus angkatan tentera mtat di haigate jalan padang tembak ditutup secara rasmi pada hari ini premis ini diserahkan kepada bahagian komunikasi dan elektronik komlek 91 rejimen semboyan diraja rsd dan wisma perwira angkatan tentera malaysia atm panglima angkatan tentera jeneral tan sri affendi buang tudm telah menyempurnakan majlis penutupan serta penyerahan premis mtat hari ini markas angkatan tentera malaysia atm bahagian hal ehwal awam j7 dalam satu kenyataan berkata majlis ini merupakan simbolik kepada penyerahan dan penutupan premis itu yang telah berpindah secara berperingkat ke pusat pengajian pertahanan nasional puspahanas putrajaya sehingga september 2019 penuntut kursus pemerintahan dan staf malaysia kpsm siri 492019 telah memulakan sesi pengajiannya di puspahanas mulai 1 september 2019 hingga 31 ogos 2020 katanya mtat merupakan sebuah institusi pendidikan tinggi atm yang menyediakan pengajian profesional di peringkat diploma lepasan ijazah kepada pegawaipegawai berpangkat mejar atau setaraf daripada ketigatiga cabang perkhidmatan atm pengajian ini adalah bagi bertujuan untuk melengkapkan dan menyediakan mereka untuk menjawat jawatan di peringkat yang tertinggi maktab ini turut menawarkan tempat kepada pegawai dari agensi kerajaan yang lain seperti polis diraja malaysia pdrm agensi penguatkuasaan maritim malaysia apmm dan juga pegawai jabatan perkhidmatan awam jpa katanya pada 1971 mtat telah dirasmikan oleh tun abdul razak hussein dan pembukaan kursus pertama pada 8 januari 1972 sejak tahun 1974 mtat mula menerima kehadiran pegawaipegawai dari negara asing melibatkan penuntut dari australia indonesia new zealand thailand dan united kingdom seterusnya pada tahun 1995 satu perjanjian persefahaman mou di antara kementerian pertahanan dengan universiti malaya um telah dimeterai bagi membolehkan peserta kursus dianugerahkan dengan diploma lepasan ijazah bagi dalam bidang pengajian strategik dan pertahanan serta anugerah lepasan maktab turus imt dan psc pada tahun 2012 maktab ini telah berkerjasama dengan universiti pertahanan nasional malaysia upnm bagi program diploma eksekutif dalam pengajian strategik dan pertahanan yang kini program itu telah dinaik taraf kepada diploma lepasan ijazah sepenuhnya ujarnya semenjak tahun 2014 mtat telah mengiktiraf alumni seramai 14 orang pegawai kanan dari dalam dan luar negara yang telah berjaya dalam perkhidmatan masingmasing melalui majlis pemasyhuran hall of fame manakala sejak penubuhannya sehingga kini mtat telah diterajui 20 orang komandan dan jumlah graduan yang telah dihasilkan seramai 5 390 orang pegawai pecahan seramai 2872 dari tentera darat 608 tentera laut diraja malaysia 672 orang dari tentera laut diraja malaysia 62 orang pegawai pdrm 5 pegawai jpa 2 dari apmm dan 1 169 orang pegawai tentera negara asing maktab ini telah dimulakan dengan 32 orang anak tempatan pada 8 januari 1972 dan pada 4 disember 2019 mtat telah dinoktahkan oleh 165 orang pegawai atm kata kenyataan itu turut hadir panglima tentera darat jeneral tan sri ahmad hasbullah mohd nawawi panglima tentera laut laksamana tan sri mohd reza mohd sany pegawaipegawai kanan atm mantan komandan dan wakil alumni 482019 serta 492020 tweets by theairtimesdsidvar "he was painstaking respectful patient he sat alongside his interview subjects with his notebook open asking questions probing slowly but steadily exploring in minute detail the personal and intimate he didn t use a tape recorder instead he wrote everything down in longhand it was laborious full sentences he wanted to hear it all life stories that stretched back in time ranging across cities and countries with details about wayward fathers with multiple families and migrant grandparents until his notebooks were full there were many sir vidia naipaul s full name vidiadhar surajprasad naipaul there was the gauche colonial from trinidad eking out a living on the margins of literary london the chronicler of empires in retreat conrad s supposed heir a western cheerleader fearful of man s primordial and atavistic nature and then much later the supercilious tweed jacket wearing cultural grandee throughout them all the self effacing travel writer cum collector of stories barely merits a mention googletag display yet it was this sir vidia that i encountered twenty three years ago when he visited malaysia researching for the sequel to his muslim world travelogue among the believers an islamic journey and it was this man or rather his way of working that was to have such a deep and lasting impact on how i approached my writing i didn t accompany him to all the interviews i only sat with him when he needed a translator those who spoke english he could manage himself i would leave them to talk sometimes for hours coming back when they were finished it was as if he was immersing himself in their lives accumulating stories colour and nuances until vs naipaul the man was submerged weighed down and almost obliterated by the sheer welter of detail years later when i read his book finding the centre two narratives the essays outlined the way he researched and wrote i began to understand that his approach this endless looping back in search of some kind of order or centre or home was an intrinsic part of his search for the truth it also revealed a surprising gentleness and yes even humility about a man who by the time i met him had acquired an unparalleled reputation for irritability and self centredness the truth was that vs naipaul liked people he found respite in their stories what he didn t like was the rigid theories of belief the philosophical and religious systems that men and women had erected around their lives those he abhorred and his scorn was vituperative his most successful novels were about figures whether mohun biswas or salim the trader from the east african coast who tried to assert themselves their independence and integrity in the face of these didactic and unforgiving systems as i watched him teasing stories observations insights and emotions from his interlocutors i began to realise the significance and relevance of what he was doing for vs naipaul the author it was straightforward enough he had a commission he needed to comprehend and then write about these non arab muslim lands to do so he gathered stories narratives that would help him map this unfamiliar terrain but he didn t just ask about their faith about their beliefs the ordinary and the everyday details of life provided him with the core around which he built his narrative and his argument in swallowing their lives and consuming their stories he was preparing himself to understand their world from the inside out by the time i met him in kuala lumpur in the mid s i had embarked on my ceritalah tell me a story columns having observed the way with which he handled his subjects i found myself doing much the same especially since i too was starting to travel and with greater frequency across southeast asia i was bored of listening to politicians and famous people tired of their carefully crafted narratives i just wanted to sit down with farmers factory workers and office clerks it was their lives that really intrigued me and it was this fascination with listening that took my columns in the resolutely ground up direction they have since assumed i owe enormous debt of gratitude to a cantankerous old nobel literature laureate who would have hated it if people realised that he was a softy deep down inside but i saw how fascinated and yes even distracted he became as he listened to different stories to be fair the sections on malaysia from beyond belief islamic excursions among the converted peoples the book that he eventually wrote based on the trip i helped with are a muddle still i like to think that they re a mess because i reinforced and encouraged his fascination with storytelling to the extent that he lost interest or focus in his initial objective chronicling the growing global wave of islamisation maybe in years to come people will likewise accuse my work of the same messy outcomes of becoming too obsessed with people s stories to the detriment of an overarching narrative but isn t that the point"
"polis sedang menyiasat seorang peguam wanita yang mengajak orang ramai untuk berkumpul di dataran merdeka di kuala lumpur malam ini dipercayai merujuk kepada pengumuman bakal perdana menteri malaysia peguam hak asasi manusia yang dikenali sebagai fadiah nadwa fikri ini dikesan memuat naik kenyataan yang mengajak orang ramai turun ke jalan sebagai membantah pengkhianatan yang berlaku dalam pemilihan perdana menteri menerusi akaun laman sosial twitter miliknya pengarah jabatan siasatan jenayah bukit aman datuk huzir mohamed berkata susulan kenyataan itu polis akan membuka kertas siasatan terhadap individu terbabit peguam wanita ini mengeluarkan kenyataan bertajuk turun ke jalan demokrasi mati dalam akaun laman sosial miliknya serta mengajak rakyat yang marah untuk berkumpul di dataran merdeka susulan itu siasatan terhadap peguam ini akan dibuat mengikut seksyen 41 akta hasutan kerana mengeluarkan satu bentuk kenyataan berbaur hasutan dan seksyen 233 akta komunikasi multimedia katanya kepada bh menerusi kenyataan sama oleh fadiah yang dimuat naik pada jam 603 minit petang itu dia mengajak manamana pihak yang tidak berpuas hati dengan pengkhianatan dalam pemilihan perdana menteri untuk berjumpanya di dataran merdeka"
murid berarak keliling kampung sambut merdeka httpwwwharakahdailynetindexphpberita12785muridberarakkelilingkampungsambutmerdekapermatang pauh pasti bahrul ulum telah mengadakan aktiviti perarakan mengibar jalur gemilang sempena menyambut hari kemerdekaan ke62 dalam kalangan muridnya di kampung mengkuang titi di sini kelmarin perarakan ini adalah sebagai merai dan menyemarakkan hari ulangtahun kemerdekaan disamping memupuk rasa cinta kepada negara selain memperkenalkan pelajar pasti kepada masyarakat sekitar seramai 120 murid telah dibawa berjalan beramairamai bersama tujuh orang guru menuju ke sekolah rendah islam bahrul ulum sribu melalui sekitar kampung sambil mengibarkan jalur gemilang ketibaan rombongan cilik ini di perkarangan sribu disambut mesra oleh mudir sribu ir ahmad rafaie dato a rashid dan para kakitangan guru serta warga pelajar sribu ir rafaie yang juga ketua penerangan pas pulau pinang amat berbesar hati dan mengalualukan kunjungan ini dan turut dipersembahkan dengan nyanyian lagu pasti cemerlang islam gemilang ketua guru pasti bahrul ulum siti sarah abdul rahman berkata aktiviti tahunan pasti ini akan sentiasa ditambahbaik dalam mewujudkan keceriaan keseronokan serta menggalakkan aktiviti menghargai kemerdekaan harakahdaily 3182019 088sosioekonomimasyarakat
"indian army soldiers patrol a street during a curfew in jammu february 16 2019 reuters pickuala lumpur march 1 deputy prime minister datuk seri dr wan azizah wan ismail hopes the ongoing indiapakistan standoff can be resolved peacefully without further violence datalayerpusheventrenderdfpslot slotname she said the standoff is nothing new and is symptomatic of the fractured and often tense relationship both countries have with one another over the years we have good ties with india and pakistan and we firmly believe whatever the problem is it can be resolved through negotiations and diplomatic channels dr wan azizah said following the launch of the yayasan petronas at klcc on wednesday wisma putra advised malaysians to postpone their travel plans to either country amid mounting concern over escalating tensions datalayerpusheventrenderdfpslot slotname mmstorymreg2 the standoff occurred following the deaths of 40 indian policemen in a suicide bombing on feb 14 in the disputed state of jammu and kashmir a pakistanibased islamist group subsequently claimed responsibility despite denials from the pakistani government the bombing led to retaliatory airstrikes by the indian military on tuesday feb 26 and exchange of fire between both sides near the kashmiri line of control on wednesday"
"a development programme tailored for the lesbian gay bisexual transgender lgbt community in terengganu is said to have helped nearly 30 of 80 mak nyah or transgender individuals return to the right path the programme introduced in 2016 by terengganu health transformation association tfitrah a nongovernmental organisation ngo aims to help the transgender community stop practising unnatural sex and get back on track said tfitrah president dr sharif ahmad"

"butterworth 30 jun bernama institusiinstitusi kerajaan mahupun swasta mempunyai tanggungjawab dalam usaha memperkasakan golongan orang kurang upaya oku dengan mewujudkan lebih banyak peluang pekerjaan kepada golongan itu timbalan ketua menteri ii pulau pinang prof dr p ramasamy berkata golongan oku boleh dilihat sebagai penyelesaian kepada masalah produktiviti kerja dengan cara yang unik dan tidak ada pada pekerja biasa dasar kerajaan telah menetapkan sekurangkurangnya satu peratus daripada pengambilan kakitangan di jabatan perkhidmatan awam adalah daripada golongan oku persoalan adalah bagaimanakah penjawatan golongan oku di sektor swasta dapat dipertingkatkan sektor swasta boleh memperolehi maklumat pencari kerja oku dari jabatan tenaga kerja dan jabatan kebajikan masyarakat katanya berucap merasmikan ekspo kerjaya oku 2019 anjuran kerajaan negeri pulau pinang di sini hari ini beliau berkata maklum balas yang diperoleh daripada sebilangan syarikat dan organisasi yang telah menjawat golongan oku mendapati bahawa mereka adalah individu yang rajin bertanggungjawab dan kurang mengambil cuti ramasamy berkata masyarakat juga perlu menghakis pandangan negatif terhadap keupayaan golongan oku tambahnya revolusi industri 40 akan membawa cabarancabaran yang baharu kepada usaha pembangunan modal insan secara keseluruhanya maka warga oku tidak seharusnya ketinggalan dalam bidang tersebut ekspo kerjaya oku 2019 anjuran kerajaan negeri dengan kerjasama penexpo events sdn bhd itu berlangsung selama dua hari bermula semalam penganjuran ekspo pada kali ketiga itu turut menggabungkan ekso kerjaya pasca siswazah dan perniagaan francais pulau pinang 2019 sebanyak 60 buah institusi pendidikan dan kerjaya menyertai ekspo itu untuk memudahkan proses temuduga tawaran pekerjaan serta tawaran melanjutkan pelajaran kepada orang ramai yang hadir bernama"
"penggunaan alat ganti tiruan terutamanya pada kenderaan boleh mengundang padah kepada pengguna yang diibaratkan sebagai bom jangka ini kerana setiap komponen kenderaan sudah direka khas mengikut spesifikasi ditetapkan demi memastikan tiada masalah teknikal berlaku terhadap kenderaan berbanding alat ganti tiruan yang tidak terjamin ketahanan dan fungsinya sekali gus menjuruskan kepada ketidakstabilan maka apa yang membimbang kan adalah risiko yang bakal berlaku seperti kemalangan kerosakan teruk dan sebagainya sehingga boleh mengundang kepada kehilangan nyawa dan kecederaan parah kepada pemandu dan pengguna jalan raya lain menurut penyelidik jabatan kejuruteraan mekanikal fakulti kejuruteraan universiti malaya prof ir dr masjuki hassan terdapat dua komponen alat ganti kenderaan iaitu alat ganti yang tidak kritikal dan juga alat ganti kritikal jelasnya bagi alat ganti tidak kritikal seperti bekas lampu kenderaan pemegang tangan dan sebagainya boleh menggunakan alat ganti tiruan yang lebih murah jika tidak berkemampuan ini bukan sahaja boleh menjimatkan pengguna yang di bawah b malah tidak mengganggu pelbagai aspek keselamatan pengguna dan juga pemandu itu sendiri namun tiada kompromi untuk alat ganti kritikal seperti sistem brek enjin sistem tayar dan sebagainya yang berkait secara langsung dengan keselamatan kenderaan maka pengguna perlu menggunakan alat ganti tulen katanya kepada s baru baru ini ujarnya penggunaan komponen kenderaan tulen bagi kategori kritikal adalah amat wajar dalam kalangan pengguna memandangkan ia telah dikeluarkan mengikut standard piawaian selain spesifikasi menerusi pelbagai kajian yang dijalankan oleh pihak pengeluar kenderaan ia bukan sahaja terjamin dari segi kualiti malah mempengaruhi aspek tuntutan pihak insurans jika sebarang perkara tidak diingini berlaku jelasnya masjuki berkata tahap kesedaran terhadap keselamatan kenderaan rakyat malaysia termasuk kebanyakan penduduk asia masih rendah kerana mereka mahu memilih alatan yang lebih murah semata mata mahu menjimatkan kos menurutnya ia sudah menjadi satu budaya apabila pengguna akan mencari kedai atau barangan paling murah berbanding ketulenan barangan tersebut jika ingin membaiki kenderaan mereka ia berbeza bagi orang barat dan juga jepun yang lebih mengutamakan keselamatan lebih lebih apabila melibatkan soal nyawa mereka enggan untuk menggunakan alat ganti tiruan sekiranya ingin menukar komponen yang rosak pada kenderaan mereka jelasnya dalam pada itu masjuki berharap pihak berkuasa perlu menjalankan tugas dengan berkesan dan terus menerus bukan sahaja bermusim jika berlaku kemalangan disebabkan penggunaan barangan tiruan kempen kesedaran melalui video kemalangan dan poster harus dipamerkan di tempat termasuk pusat membeli belah dan sekolah agar orang ramai mengetahui akan bahaya penggunaan barangan tiruan jelasnya"

"on saturday the website of commanderinchief min aung hlaing said a military court that visited the northern state found soldiers had shown weakness in following instructions in some incidents at a village said to have been a rohingya massacre site in 2018 the associated press news agency reported the existence of at least five graves of rohingya in the village gutarpyin in the township of buthidaung but government officials at the time said 19 terrorists had died and their bodies were carefully buried on sunday military spokesperson tun tun nyi told reuters the investigations findings were secret we dont have the right to know about it he said by telephone they will release another statement about it when the procedure is finished the court comprising a majorgeneral and two colonels was formed in march to respond to accusations of mass killings rape and arson by the security forces made by the united nations and rights groups amnesty international and human rights watch it visited rakhine twice in july and august myanmar forces had launched their offensive in rakhine in response to a series of attacks by rohingya insurgents on security posts near the bangladesh border last year a un factfinding mission said the military campaign was orchestrated with genocidal intent and recommended charging min aung hlaing photo and five other generals with the gravest crimes under international law myanmar has denied the accusations although min aung hlaing said last month a number of security men may have been involved a previous military investigation in 2017 exonerated the security forces of any crimes myanmar is facing growing international calls for accountability over the rakhine campaign the international criminal court has opened a preliminary examination into the violence while a panel formed by myanmar that includes philippine diplomat rosario manalo and japans former un envoy kenzo oshima is due to publish its findings reuters"
"dewan rakyat speaker datuk mohamad ariff md yusof speaks during the roundtable on electoral reform the way forward for free and fair elections in parliament november 30 2018 picture by yusof mat isakuala lumpur march 1 dewan rakyat speaker tan sri mohamad ariff md yusof today said that the parliament sitting scheduled for march 9 might be postponed to a later date dfpdisplayslot mohamad ariff said that he would discuss the matter with the prime ministers office to obtain confirmation and finalise a date for the next sitting dfpdisplayslotmmstoryoutstream maybe not on march 9 i will officially contact the pmo tomorrow he told the berita harian news portal according to schedule the 1st meeting of the 3rd session of the 14th parliament should begin on march 9 and was to be attended by the yang dipertuan agong dfpdisplayslotmmstorymreg2 the pakatan harapan ph coalition now in the opposition following todays swearingin of tan sri muhyiddin yassin as prime minister has been calling for the parliament session to be maintained in order to endorse the prime ministers position and get certainty that he commanded the majority of the 222 mps of the lower house dfpdisplayslotmmteads he said that the sitting must be done soon as the new federal government under ppbm umno pas and other parties may attempt to postpone it as long as they can in order to induce the 112 mps that reportedly supports dr mahathir to defect to the other side"
astroawani20190401tiada petunjuk operasi lynas sebabkan peningkatan konsentrasi logam berathttpwwwastroawanicomberitamalaysiatiadapetunjukoperasilynassebabkanpeningkatankonsentrasilogamberat202752 kuantan jawatankuasa penilaian yang ditubuhkan oleh kementerian tenaga sains teknologi alam sekitar dan perubahan iklim mestecc tidak memberi sebarang petunjuk bahawa peningkatan konsentrasi logam berat di dalam air bawah tanah adalah disebabkan operasi oleh lynas malaysia sdn bhd lynas pengurus besar pematuhan keselamatan dan pengawalan radiasi lynas prof ismail bahari berkata jawatankuasa itu dalam laporannya yang dikemukakan kepada kerajaan pada disember 2018 hanya membuat cadangan untuk menjalankan penyelidikan lanjut tentang air bawah tanah di kawasan perindustrian gebeng di sini lynas dengan kerjasama makmalmakmal yang bertauliah kini menjalankan siasatan bebas untuk menolak sebarang kemungkinan bahawa pencemaran itu disebabkan oleh operasi kami katanya dalam satu kenyataan di sini pada ahad ismail berkata demikian susulan kenyataan timbalan menteri di jabatan perdana menteri fuziah salleh seperti yang dilaporkan oleh media bahawa air bawah tanah di bawah lynas tercemar dengan logam berat fuziah yang juga ahli parlimen kuantan mendakwa bahawa air bawah tanah yang tercemar akan memberi kesan kepada penduduk kampung yang tinggal di sekitar gebeng kerana sebahagian daripada mereka masih bergantung kepada telaga tiub untuk kegunaan harian mereka ismail menarik perhatian bahawa jawatankuasa itu yang terdiri daripada pakar dalam pelbagai bidang telah menyatakan bahawa operasi lynas adalah berisiko rendah mematuhi peraturanperaturan berkaitan dan kemudahan penyimpanan residu dikendalikan dengan cara yang selamat dan diluluskan oleh pengawal selia jawatankuasa tersebut juga menyatakan bahawa lynas merupakan syarikat pengeluaran nadir bumi dan ia tidak boleh dibandingkan dengan loji nuklear atau kilang yang menghasilkan thorium atau uranium risiko sinaran tidak ditentukan oleh separuh hayat sesuatu bahan sahaja tetapi lebih penting oleh tahap pendedahan malaysia menggunapakai tahap pendedahan yang dibenarkan oleh suruhanjaya antarabangsa bagi perlindungan radiologi icrp bagi pekerja dan orang awam dan lynas mematuhi sepenuhnya tahap ini katanya ismail berkata bahawa residu radioaktif sangat rendah yang dihasilkan oleh lynas bukan satusatunya sisa yang dikeluarkan di malaysia kerana industri minyak dan gas industri perlombongan timah juga mengeluarkan sisa radioaktif industriindustri berkenan telah beroperasi selama bertahuntahun katanya ismail berkata bahawa lynas komited untuk menyumbang kepada pembangunan ekonomi malaysia dan membantu malaysia menjadi satusatunya pusat nadir bumi di luar china lynas juga telah mewujudkan lebih 1000 peluang pekerjaan secara langsung di negara ini dengan 97 peratus daripada pekerjaan itu diisi oleh rakyat malaysia bernama7147sosioekonomiekonomi
"johor bahru 1 feb satu laporan polis telah dibuat hari ini susulan tindakan sekumpulan lelaki yang sengaja mencetuskan kekacauan pada majlis rapat umum angkatan bersatu anak muda armada parti pribumi bersatu malaysia bersatu johor malam tadi ketua armada syed saddiq syed abdul rahman berkata ketika program dijalankan ada satu kumpulan individu yang tidak dikenali yang datang dan mencetuskan huruhara beliau mendakwa kumpulan menimbulkan kekacauan disyaki daripada pihak pembangkang yang berniat untuk menganggu program tersebut mereka melemparkan katakata kesat memaki hamun dan menghalau kami semua kami telah membuat laporan polis mengenai perkara ini kami juga ada mempunyai rakaman video wajahwajah mereka yang terlibat untuk dijadikan bahan bukti katanya dalam hantaran laman rasmi facebook miliknya hari ini syed saddiq yang juga menteri belia dan sukan menegaskan mengutuk sekeraskerasnya tindakan yang sangat kotor jahat dan tidak berdemokratik seperti ini semalam lebih kurang 200 orang individu berpakaian hitam dan mengepung tempat makan majlis tersebut mereka semua berdiri mengepung tempat makan kami sergah dan langgar semua tetamu yang hadir mereka laung dan pekik macammacam katakata kesat ibu bapa saya juga jadi saksi malam ini ini apa ada anakanak kecil wanita di dalam majlis paling teruk mereka sergah supaya menteri minta maaf kepada tunku mahkota johor tmj kalau mahu pulang dari majlis apa yang berlaku saya pun tak tahu yang saya tahu ini biadap dan kurang ajar apa salah saya saya berkhidmat untuk rakyat bayangkan dikepung lebih 200 orang individu lagak seperti gangster saya sendiri yb rafiq yb mazlan dan lain terpaksa lari guna jalan tikus dan lompat pagar lari seperti orang salah jelas syed saddiq dalam kenyataannya malam tadi syed saddiq dan beberapa pemimpin lain terpaksa memanjat pagar untuk melarikan diri daripada kumpulan yang didakwa menyerang ketika pertemuan di sebuah resort di ulu tiram malam tadi tweets by theairtimesdsidvar "umno online laman berita rasmi pertubuhan kebangsaan melayu bersatu atau umno sepang 30 jun timbalan presiden umno datuk seri mohamad hasan mengingatkan ahli parti agar terus bersatu padu dan meninggalkan perkara serta faktor lain yang menyebabkan parti boleh berpecahbelah pada masa yang sama beliau turut menyeru agar ahli umno samasama mengimbau dan merenung serta belajar daripada kesilapan yang lalu supaya kebangkitan umno dapat diteruskan tanpa boleh digangugugat yang penting kita jangan berpecahpecah inilah permintaan saya dan kita ambillah iktibar dengan belajar daripada kesilapan lalu untuk kita samasama renungkan apa sebab kita kalah selepas 61 diberikan mandat oleh rakyat banyaklah sebabnya bak kata pepatah orang tua sakit berpunca mati bersebab orang tuatua kata bila kencing manis ada sebabnya makan gula banyak dan sebagainya lagi jadi kita lihat ada bendabenda yang berlaku di dunia ada sebab dan puncanya jangan kita menuding jari kepada orang dan kita kalah 14 kali berlawan sekali kalah janganlah terus moyok bangun segak berjalan katanya beliau berkata demikian ketika berucap merasmikan mesyuarat umno bahagian sepang di sini hari ini walaupun umno kalah sambung mohamed jangan sesekali menyebut parti tersebut sebagai pembangkang kerana ianya adalah sebuah perjuangan jangan sesekali sebut umno ini pembangkang umno bukan pembangkang ini adalah perjuangan kita yang jadi pembangkang adalah saya di dalam dun negeri sembilan parti umno ini parti perjuangan yang memperjuangkan maruah martabat orang melayu dari segi psikologinya kalau kita katakan pembangkang kita dah lemah kita adalah sebuah perjuangan saya tuantuan semua adalah menyambung perjuangan yang diasaskan oleh datuk nenek moyang kita dahulu sampai ke zaman kita kalah nak buat macam mana katanya tambahnya lagi tidak ada benda yang boleh diselesaikan dan apa yang penting adalah mencari punca apa sebabnya berlaku sedemikian rupa jangan kita bertelingkah dan berselisih faham kita samasama raikan pandangan tidak ada benda yang boleh diselesaikan dan cari punca apa sebab kita berpecahpecah maka punca utama untuk kita bangkit semula adalah bersatu padu bersatu kita supaya kita boleh berjalan seiring dan kembali semua kepada semangat penubuhan umno kalau ini dapat kita tanam dan pegang elokelok tidak akan tersasar kita dan dah ada dalam perlembagaan kita asas utama pertubuhan kebangsaaan melayu bersatu diwujudkan tidak lain dan tidak bukan memperjuangkan maruah martabat bangsa agama tanah air kita katanya mediaumno"
"johor bahru sekolah kebangsaan taman perling di sini mengambil pendekatan berbeza pada musim persekolahan baharu tahun ini apabila memperkenalkan penggunaan sistem pengimbas wajah untuk merekod kehadiran pelajar guru dan kakitangan sekolah itu guru besar sekolah itu zamri abd wahab berkata aplikasi terkini itu digunakan supaya dapat melancarkan pengurusan seharian sekali gus mengurangkan beban kerja guru divgptad15671374050220 kami sentiasa terbuka untuk gunakan teknologi terkini selaras dengan pembelajaran abad ke21 katanya ketika ditemui pada hari pertama persekolahan di sekolah berkenaan di sini hari ini zamri yang telah empat tahun berkhidmat di sekolah itu berkata sekolah itu merupakan yang pertama di negeri ini menggunakan sistem itu dan diharapkan dalam masa yang sama dapat menarik minat murid untuk mendekati atau mempelajari teknologi maklumat it divgptad15560888824570 data yang direkodkan melalui sistem itu akan terus dimuat naik ke aplikasi pangkalan data murid apdm yang bukan sahaja mengandungi rekod kehadiran murid tetapi juga maklumat peribadi mereka sk taman perling mempunyai sebanyak 1034 murid yang termasuk prasekolah dan kelas pendidikan khas membabitkan dua sesi persekolahan serta 76 guru dan 12 kakitangan pengurusan dan sokongan zamri berkata sistem itu yang menelan kos ribuan ringgit disumbangkan oleh sebuah badan pertubuhan bukan kerajaan myrahub foundation pada masa depan beliau berharap sistem yang sama dapat diguna pakai untuk merekod kehadiran ibu bapa serta pelawat yang dapat meningkatkan aspek keselamatan bernama"
"lawmakers opposed to the possibility of britain leaving the european union on oct 31 without an orderly transition arrangement are drawing up plans to try to legislate to force prime minister boris johnson to rule out a nodeal exit johnson has said his efforts to strike a new withdrawal agreement with the eu would be hampered by any attempt in westminster to block a nodeal brexit he has limited lawmakers flexibility by suspending parliament for about a month before the brexit deadline and if they do pass legislation senior minister michael gove on sunday refused to guarantee it would be heeded corbyn will say johnsons move to shut down parliament is an attack on democracy which will be resisted according to excerpts of a speech he will make in salford north england on monday the shadow cabinet will be meeting to finalise our plans to stop the disaster of no deal ahead of the return of parliament on tuesday he will say referring to a meeting of senior labour figures we are working with other parties to do everything necessary to pull our country back from the brink johnson photo told the sunday times that the choice for lawmakers was either to side with corbyn who wanted to scrub the democratic verdict of the people and plunge this country into chaos or with those who wanted to get on with it corbyn however will say the battle to stop a nodeal brexit is not a struggle between those who want to leave the eu and those who want to stay its a battle of the many against the few who are hijacking the referendum result to shift even more power and wealth towards those at the top he will say labour said the threat of a nodeal brexit was adding to what it said was the damage already done to industry by nine years of conservative government the government said corbyn was only offering more delay and uncertainty only johnson and the conservatives can provide the leadership britain needs leave the eu by oct 31 whatever the circumstances and deliver the change british people voted for said conservative deputy chairman paul scully labours brexit spokesperson keir starmer said on sunday the partys plan which will be published on tuesday had one very simple aim to stop johnson taking britain out of the eu without a deal if necessary by forcing him to extend the brexit deadline again around a dozen lawmakers from johnsons conservatives could back the labour initiative former minister rory stewart told sky news on sunday johnson will meet some of the rebels on monday to discuss his efforts towards securing a withdrawal deal another former minister david gauke said on sunday gauke told sky news he was prepared to disobey conservative party discipline to prevent a nodeal brexit reuters"
