"kuala lumpur dec 31 tun dr mahathir mohamad tonight called on malaysians to develop themselves in tandem with the governments efforts to bring progress to the country in his new year 2020 message the prime minister said that despite malaysia not being able to fully achieve developed nation status there are elements of a developed nation that can still be implemented he identified these values as diligence discipline maintaining cleanliness being tolerant showing mutual respect and being polite and magnanimous these are attributes that differentiate developed people from those who are undeveloped and backward these noble values represent all cultures religions and races and the diversity of malaysia should make us more keenly aware of these attributes he said referring to 2020 dr mahathir said the year is close to his heart when i helmed the malaysian administration for the first time the government through vision 2020 set the target for malaysia to achieve developed nation status in that year however of late we realised that the objective cannot be fully achieved and as such we drew up a new blueprint that we have identified as the shared prosperity vision 2030 in other words we have pushed forward the target to 2030 and we believe we will be able to achieve the objective he said dr mahathir said the government often talks about efforts to develop and prosper the country because we have been entrusted with the trust to do so when we accepted the responsibility to be the government dr mahathir said the government cannot just leave the fate of the country to chance without crafting suitable strategies and plans to develop and prosper the nation in short we have to continue to strive and not depend on fate to develop ourselves he said the prime minister also spoke of the need for malaysians to rise above political polemics that he said will get them nowhere while some of us are still trapped in political polemics which will not help selfdevelopment the fact is that the external situation does not promise us a smooth journey he said dr mahathir pointed out that the challenges brought about by the trade war between the superpowers and fastpaced technological development are factors that will determine the direction of the world and the country we have to accept this situation and strive to develop ourselves to address these changes and challenges he said the prime minister said the development of digital technology has changed the way of doing business and providing services those who understand this transformation have found avenues for employment and to earn an income those who did not change have found themselves without a livelihood he said however he underscored that the government will continue to help the people face these new challenges through existing and new programmes it is the governments hope that the people will take advantage of these opportunities and develop themselves along with the government he said adding that when they are successful the government and the country will ride on that success dr mahathir also referred to the kl summit that kuala lumpur hosted recently and said it provided an opportunity to explore new essential and critical areas not only for the benefit of muslims but also malaysians of other faiths he said the summit showed to other islamic countries how malaysians of various religions are able to live together peacefully without excessive conflicts and rifts in a scenario of diversity it never crossed our mind to introduce laws to segregate the people or immigrants based on religion or race although we have provisions for bumiputeras these are to ensure their survival and are not intended to negate or rob others of their rights he said dr mahathir said that it is for this reason that the countrys wealth is not only in the hands of the bumiputeras as it is also shared with and in many cases held by the other races a country can overcome challenges when its people have strength by way of industriousness and eagerness for knowledge he said adding that a high level of knowledge can strengthen the nation in various disciplines"

"kuantan parents have been reminded to keep an eye on their children during the ongoing movement control order mco to avoid arrest pahang police chief datuk abd jalil hassan said parents should be responsible for monitoring their children and keeping tabs on their whereabouts to avoid their being detained for violating the mco make sure the children are at home and not disobeying the mco as they could be arrested please monitor your children as the police will further enforce the mco to ensure no one leave their home inspections will not only be conducted at town areas or housing settlements but also in rural areas felda settlements lorong tikus illegal routes and state borders checks at orang asli settlements showed that the community have been complying with the mco he said he was speaking to reporters after attending a blood donation programme jointly organised by the armed forces and police at the sri panching camp here today he said since the mco was enforced 24 individuals in the state have been charged in court for violating the law and they have been handed fines amounting rm1000 and six months prison jalil said the police and armed forces have set up 42 roundtheclock roadblocks in pahang and they will be increased at more locations in stages to date between 95 per cent and 99 per cent of the people in pahang have complied with the mco which has been an outstanding achievement i would like to advise the head of the family who is allowed to go out to purchase daily essentials to consider online methods as more premises have started to offer online facilities to make it easier for people to do their grocery shopping he said meanwhile he said 46 members of the pahang police contingent have been categorised as patientsunderinvestigation pui for covid19 and are currently undergoing 14days selfquarantine in their respective homes he said to date three policemen from the tabligh cluster have tested positive for covid19 and are currently being "kuala lumpur the recent blunder involving the jalur gemilang and perak flag at a basketball tournament would not have happened if everyone is cautious and sensitive towards our flags and ensure their proper display malaysia unity foundation trustee tan sri lee lam thye said malaysians should not be ignorant of or disregard the significance of the jalur gemilang as it was a symbol of the countrys sovereignty it has 14 red and white stripes representing 13 states and the federal territories with a 14point yellow star on a blue background nothing more and nothing less he said every citizen and organisation that loved the nation could express their patriotism sincerely by flying the jalur gemilang correctly as it would create the right atmosphere a sense of pride and the patriotic spirit at a however before we fly our flags we must always make it certain that they are in order and properly displayed its our responsibility as patriotic malaysians to make sure that the jalur gemilang is not flown upside down tattered and faded lee said the two recent blunders involving flags were a reminder that when we handle national or state flags we must make sure they were flown or displayed with the right symbols we should never take our flags and flying them for granted improper flying of flags is very humiliating and uncalled for as it is tantamount to a mockery and disrespect of the country it is all the more serious when it comes to our national flag which also symbolises the spirit of love pride patriotism loyalty and unity for the nation he said ignorance and lack of enthusiasm for flying the jalur gemilang properly might reflect a lack of patriotism pride loyalty and devotion to the nation we should remember that it was under the common flag that malaysia attained independence and built our lives harmoniously irrespective of race colour or creed under jalur gemilang also we strive towards building a cohesive united and sustainable nation for our future generations to prevent such incidents lee said more needed to be done in education institutions and communities to educate and improve awareness on the significance of our flags and why they must be treated with the highest respect he said such efforts could be carried out by relevant ministries with the help of the media and nongovernmental organisations on sunday a fivepointed star flag with only 11 red and white stripes was displayed on the stadiums tv screen as the national anthem was played at the opening of the 28th maba milo lum mun chak cup basketball tournament on wednesday the malaysian basketball association maba issued an apology over the incident following criticism youth and sports minister syed saddiq syed abdul rahman said the incident was insulting and shameful lee said now that maba has apologised over the recent incident which was unintentional i feel the apology should be accepted but it should be a lesson to all new straits timesnew straits times press m bhda part of media prima group"

"pasir mas the lack of fencing along the malaysiathailand border in kelantan has proven to be difficult for the authorities especially the police in curbing smuggling activities in the state kelantan police chief datuk hasanuddin hassan said this had also made it strenuous for the police to monitor the areas more effectively in efforts to prevent the smuggling of contraband items including drugs as we know the border in kelantan stretches over 134 km of land and water giving rise to hundreds of illegal routes and monitoring them can be very challenging over at padang besar perlis fencing has been installed throughout the border but not here he said during a town hall session at dewan apam putra here today hassanuddin said apart from the absence of fences the lack of smart surveillance technologies at the border crossing points too has posed a challenge for the authorities to prevent illicit goods from entering the country when suspects are nabbed they often admit that the illicit goods were brought in through legitimate entry points as such we need to install high technology systems that could conduct more thorough inspections he said the drought season at the beginning of the year and the floods at year end were also a problem as the smugglers would take the opportunity to intensify their activities during these weather conditions during the dry spell sungai golok would dry up facilitating crossborder activities for smugglers and during the monsoon season it would be tougher to carry out border patrol along the river he said bernama 46050 petaling jaya selangor malaysia tel 6037784 6688 fax 6037785 2624 6037785 2625"

2019 prime minister tun dr mahathir mohamad conceded that some malaysians were dissatisfied with the pakatan harapan administrations performance over the year dfpdisplayslot however he said the government took note of the publics unhappiness and pledged that the ruling coalition would do better before urging the country to back his administrations efforts to deliver this dfpdisplayslotmmstoryoutstream while there is a bit of anxiety in the face of unforeseen events that can be devastating and frustrating on the whole we have to be confident that the effort we put into 2019 will be fruitful in 2020 the government is aware that throughout 2019 there were some issues that cause dissatisfaction among the people dfpdisplayslotmmstorymreg2 we recognise and take note of these voices and efforts to develop this country remain the governments main responsibility he told the thousands who attended the new years eve event at dataran merdeka last night dfpdisplayslotmmteads dr mahathir said that 2020 was particularly significant for him as it was the target for vision 2020 that he introduced in 1991 he went on to concede that the goal to make malaysia a developed nation this year will not be met but said this was because tun abdullah ahmad badawi and datuk seri najib razak who succeeded him had deviated from his blueprint abdullah succeeded dr mahathir when the latter left office after his stint as the fourth prime minister our hope is that 2020 will bring us more happiness and prosperity than 2019 that we have left with many bitter and sweet memories however due to the approaches taken year ago by the fifth and sixth government leaders the vision was not achieved and this year 2019 we had to extend that tenure for another 10 years he said in october dr mahathir introduced the shared prosperity vision spv 2030 a tenyear plan to guide malaysia towards achieving the goals set for this year with an added emphasis on narrowing income gaps in the country dr mahathir added that spv 2030 would only be successful with the support of all sections of the country beginning now he went on to stress the importance of ensuring the nations wealth and development are felt by all layers of malaysia when the poor increase their income through opportunities introduced by the government the gap between the poor and the rich can be reduced he said more than 10000 malaysian came to welcome the new year in kuala lumpur last night with people filling up jalan raja laut jalan tun perak and padang dataran merdeka for the campaigning period with malaymuslims grouses dominating the headlines datalayerpusheventrenderdfpslot slotname so much so that sjkt ladang semenyih had to deploy several banners along jalan semenyih pleading for prime minister tun dr mahathir mohamad home minister tan sri muhyiddin yassin and education minister maszlee malik to save the school housing around 400 students the school needs a proper entrance driveway as the current onelane road is too narrow and wished for a little space from a parcel of land at the side owned by sime darby property bhd the giant firm had been unwilling to budge on the issue were not satisfied with the handling of the sjkt ladang semenyih issue and increasing living expenses is especially burdensome on the b40 category among others complained hulu langat mic youth chief s chandranthevan claiming the school was not given the provisions due datalayerpusheventrenderdfpslot slotname mmstorymreg2 it took fellow ethnic indian minister dr xavier jeyakumar to assist the school the water land and natural resources minister came on sunday before meeting sime darby on monday by tuesday the school was granted 49 acres of land for a dropoff areashanti kandasamy speaks to reporters about the semenyih byelectionhandouts a powerful loyalty motivator but dr xaviers gesture may yet to change the minds of some from the community who feel they have been robbed off their cash handouts after pakatan harapan ph took over it used to be rm450 and we got it three times now theyre giving us rm100 only but for me they said i dont qualify said cleaner shanti kandasamy who is now the sole earner in her family after her husband passed away three years ago i feel as though when bn was in power our welfare was better taken care of she added referring to previous ruling coalition barisan nasional another sexagenarian who wished to go by agnes also told malay mail she felt betrayed by the reduction in the handouts people are saying all kinds of things against najib but when he ate we ate too said an animated agnes who felt things were better under datuk seri najib razaks administration despite the latters litany of charges for cases involving 1malaysia development bhd 1mdb he may have taken money but he gave it out too in fact if you ran for office and were generous id vote for you too right now were not getting anything so how to vote opposition she asked as she rode off on her bicyclehulu langat pkr chief m puvenendran speaks to reporters about the semenyih byelectionsuch sentiments were common here and hulu langat pkr chief m puvenendran did not blame lowearning households for feeling that way as he tirelessly campaigned for ph in indianmajority areas there are many simpleminded folks around here the lessereducated ones are easier to manipulate he said when met over a lunch out of the blazing sun instead of being duped by empty promises masked by handouts every now and then they need to be more proactive and learn the system waiting for the first person to give you a gift to inadvertently buy your vote is not going to help the country puvenendran added puvenendran also insisted that the late assemblyman bakhtiar mohd noor had plans to help the indian community before his untimely death in january 11 from a heart attackmics chandrathevan speaks to malay mail at bandar bukit mahkota february 23 2019mics chandranthevan claimed semenyih voters were already having second thoughts about bakhtiar which may spill over and affect their perception of the latters soninlaw muhammad aiman zainali who is running as phs candidate bakhtiar never visited the indian community and his office would always say they had no allocation funds whenever we pleaded with him to provide assistance for poorer families he claimed giving pakatan time to prove itself however voters polled by malay mail in taman dusun jaya nearby one of the residential areas with significant indian population conceded that ph may just need more time with bakhtiar having only served as a state lawmaker less than eight months before his death prior to bakhtiar the assemblymen had been from bn stretching back to at least 2004 even as then pakatan rakyat governed selangor from 2008 ph is still in its infancy so we cant ask them for a lot give them five years if things are still bad drop them and vote opposition said driver adhimualm who was having a chat with other gentlemen outside his house retiree ramachandran kandan concurred for him bn leaders were just greedy politicians who left nothing for the people theyd eat the whole cake and leave nothing for us said ramachandran who was formerly with volunteer corps rela and the auxilliary police force ph is doing more good than bn and there are lesser problems now as they are trying to fix things everyone must realise this and be patient with mere days before the byelection both ph and bn felt they have grasped a stake within the meagre indian votes chandranthevan claimed 65 per cent of indians will vote for the opposition while puvenendran claimed ph has the support of 78 per cent from the communitym kanthi speaks to malay mail in semenyih february 26 2019in the end it may seem like the indian community here will vote for whoever they feel would have a better chance of representing its interests and helping with daily breadandbutter issues with national scandals playing minor role in influencing their decisions i have no preference towards any party as long as the winner takes care of semenyih and not forget the indian community said m kanthi a maintenance staff this is our country and we must all look after it regardless of race or religion 21221politikmic
"isa the former telok kemang umno division chief recently submitted his documents to leave the party in order to contest after umno decided to boycott the byelection picture by yusof mat isakuala lumpur sept 30 mohd najib mohd isa has said he is willing to face party disciplinary action for campaigning in support of his father in the port dickson byelection that has been boycotted by barisan nasional bn utusan online reported the port dickson umno youth chief saying it is his responsibility as a son to support his father tan sri isa abdul samads decision to contest as an independent candidate i had been asked by several umno leaders about the matter and explained to them my stance in supporting my fathers campaigning he said mohd najib said he is unsure if he will face action from umno as he is currently focusing on the byelection adding that he would think about it later and leave it to the party mmstorymreg2 as a son i must campaign to ensure his victory my father is contesting to represent port dicksons constituents since six of the seven candidates are not locals i hope the umno leadership understands my fathers decision as he will not be contesting against a party or bn candidate he said isa the former telok kemang umno division chief recently submitted his documents to leave the party in order to contest after umno decided to boycott the byelection per the partys constitution isas membership has been automatically revoked for contesting as an independent candidate"
"ahli parlimen pagoh tan sri muhyiddin yassin melakukan sujud syukur di kediamannya sebaik seri paduka baginda yang dipertuan agong berkenan untuk melantik beliau sebagai perdana menteri kelapan menerusi satu video berdurasi 50 saat berkenaan muhyiddin dilihat melakukan sujud syukur di kediamannya sebaik menerima berita daripada istana negara bahawa beliau diperkenan untuk dilantik sebagai perdana menteri keratan video menunjukkan muhyiddin melakukan sujud syukur di kediamannya semalam video itu turut memperlihatkan bahawa muhyiddin menadah tangan berdoa untuk menzahirkan rasa kesyukuran memandangkan kemelut politik negara dapat diselesaikan pada masa sama suasana di kediaman muhyiddin bertukar ceria sebaik dan penyokong serta ahli parlimen bersatu dilihat saling berpelukan serta bersalaman untuk mengucapkan tahniah sesama mereka ia disusuli dengan laungan takbir serta linangan air mata beberapa individu yang terharu dengan pengumuman berkenaan"

"kuala lumpur the ministry of health moh has requested rm30 billion for administrative and development costs in budget 2019 says deputy health minister dr lee boon chye he said this was 201 per cent of the estimated gross domestic product gdp for 2019 currently the allocation for the public sector health is at 187 per cent of gdp namely rm2658 billion in 2018 with 50 per cent of the allocation to cover the needs of government hospitals he said during the question and answer session at the dewan rakyat yesterday bernama"
bernama20190331skmm tahan tiga individu salah guna sosial mediahttpwwwbernamacombmnewsphpid1711328 kuala lumpur 31 mac bernama suruhanjaya komunikasi dan multimedia malaysia skmm dengan kerjasama polis diraja malaysia pdrm menahan tiga individu dalam serbuan untuk mengekang penyalahgunaan media sosial ketua bahagian penguatkuasaan dan siasatan skmm datuk mohd shafie harun berkata kesemua individu ditahan atas kesalahan menjurus kepada perbuatan menghantar kandungan jelik dan video seks serta lucah melalui aplikasi whatsapp dan sistem pesanan ringkas sms dengan niat menganggu dan menyakitkan hati orang lain rfpinfeeddefaultrunimmediatelytrue dalam serbuan itu turut dirampas sejumlah 16 barang kes berupa kad sim kad memori telefon bimbit cakera keras luaran external hard disk dan komputer riba selain penemuan gambargambar lucah dan video seks berkaitan dengan keskes yang disiasat operasi serbuan kali ini tertumpu kepada empat lokasi iaitu di bangi shah alam kuala lumpur dan cameron highlands serbuan terbaru ini dibuat selepas pihak skmm menerima aduan daripada orang ramai dan menyusul hanya seminggu selepas serbuan sama dijalankan di 11 lokasi di beberapa buah negeri yang lain katanya dalam kenyataan hari ini menurut mohd shafie kes berkenaan disiasat di bawah seksyen 233 akta komunikasi dan multimedia akm 1998 dan jika sabit kesalahan akan dikenakan denda tidak melebihi rm50000 atau penjara setahun atau keduaduanya sekali kandungan yang diterima dalam telefon pengadu dan kad sim serta telefon bimbit perlu diserahkan kepada jabatan forensik digital skmm untuk analisa forensik digital sehingga 30 mac skmm telah menerima 110 kes berkaitan salah guna media sosial manakala tahun lepas sahaja sebanyak 237 kes direkodkan selain itu 710 barang kes disita dari 2018 sehingga 30 mac ini kes berprofil tinggi seperti penghinaan terhadap nabi muhammad saw atau institusi diraja diberi keutamaan satu untuk diselesaikan dalam dua hingga empat minggu manakala keskes keutamaan dua harus diselesaikan dalam 12 minggu sementara kes keutamaan tiga dalam 24 minggu dalam pada itu mohd shafie berkata kempen advokasi di seluruh negara menerusi program klik dengan bijak akan terus diperhebatkan bagi menyemai penggunaan internet secara berhemah dalam kalangan pengguna media sosial di negara ini pengguna media sosial juga dinasihatkan supaya membuat aduan kepada pihak skmm sekiranya mempunyai sebarang maklumat berkenaan dengan isu salah guna media sosial dengan menyalurkan maklumat ke talian 1800188030 email aduanskmmmcmcgovmy whatsapp 0162206 262 sms 15888 dan twitter mcmcreact bernama 1468sosioekonomisosial

"kuala lumpur april 30 police arrested six people including two civil servants suspected of selling fake medical certificates mcs in several raids in and around kuala lumpur and selangor the five men and one woman aged between 27 and 42 were arrested by a police team from the intelligence operation division commercial crime investigation division sentul police headquarters on april 22 to 27 kuala lumpur police chief datuk seri mazlan lazim said they had also inspected three houses occupied by all the suspects in pandan indah ampang cheras kuala lumpur including a printing company in seri kembangan selangor in the raid 4631 mcs from clinics and government hospitals 257 sick leave certificate books with private clinic official receipt book and 216 different types of private and government clinic doctors stamps were seized police also seized five mobile phones a computer set and a hard drive he told reporters at the kuala lumpur police contingent headquarters ipk here today mazlan said the raid was carried out after information received on april 12 from a complainant working as an assistant administrative officer at a district health office in the capital he explained that the complainant claimed to have received mcs from his two staff on april 10 dated feb 11 and 12 from ampang hospital he also claimed that the mcs issued were confirmed false following the confirmation by the hospital that no records showed the staff had sought treatment there on that date following the report police detained two men who were civil servants before nabbing four more individuals including a woman three of the men were arrested on suspicion of being members of the group that sells fake mcs while the woman worked in a printing company that printed the fake mcs he said mazlan said the two civil servants had been released on police bail on tuesday while the other four were remanded until today and police would be applying to extend the remand period"
"politics"
"kuala lumpur hubungan antara malaysia dan rusia kekal mantap walaupun berlaku bencana penembakan jatuh pesawat penerbangan malaysia mh17 lima tahun yang lalu kata menteri luar datuk saifuddin abdullah hari ini beliau berkata malaysia dan rusia berada di halaman yang sama mengenai kemalangan mh17 itu yang mengorbankan kesemua 298 orang di dalam pesawat termasuk 15 anak kapal pada tahun 2014 ketika ditanya sama ada hubungan antara malaysia dan rusia merosot selepas tragedi itu saifuddin berkata tidak tentang mh17 kita berada pada halaman yang sama kita mungkin mempunyai alasan yang berbeza untuk berada pada halaman yang sama tetapi kita berada di halaman yang sama terutamanya kita tidak selesa dengan beberapa usaha oleh pihak tertentu yang terlalu cepat membuat tuduhan terhadap negara dan individu tertentu sementara siasatan masih berjalan katanya kepada media di sini hari ini divgptad15560888824570 terdahulu saifuddin mengadakan mesyuarat dua hala dengan menteri luar russia sergey lavrov di luar acara mesyuarat menteri luar asean ke52 amm di sini hari ini saifuddin berkata malaysia tetap tegas untuk memastikan siasatan ke atas mh17 dijalankan dengan betul secara terbuka dan akauntabiliti penerbangan mh17 sedang dalam penerbangan dari lapangan terbang schiphol amsterdam ke kuala lumpur ketika ditembak jatuh berhampiran torez di donetsk oblast ukraine kirakira 40 kilometer dari sempadan rusia pada 17 julai 2014 penumpang dalam pesawat malang itu ialah dari dari malaysia belanda australia indonesia united kingdom belgium jerman new zealand kanada dan filipina di belanda pada 19 jun tahun ini penyiasat antarabangsa yang diketuai oleh belanda menuduh empat orang tiga orang rusia dan seorang dari ukraine dengan pembunuhan atas tragedi itu bagaimanapun perdana menteri tun dr mahathir mohamad berkata malaysia tidak berpuas hati dengan laporan terbaharu mengenai penembakan pesawat mh17 itu dengan mengatakan tidak ada bukti hanya khabar angin mengenai pertemuan dua hala dengan rakan sejawatannya hari ini saifuddin berkata mereka membincangkan beberapa isu termasuk memperkukuhkan kerjasama pendidikan dan pertahanan kita berterima kasih kepada rusia kerana terus membeli minyak sawit dari malaysia terutamanya ketika kita menghadapi pemboikotan daripada kesatuan eropah eu dari segi pendidikan kita menghantar lebih banyak pelajar ke russia untuk belajar perubatan malaysia gembira dengan reka bentuk kurikulum yang sangat maju tetapi malaysia membuat permintaan supaya pelajar perubatan akan diberi pendedahan lebih banyak dari segi latihan praktikal bernama"
"mahu mengubah persepsi masyarakat terhadap anggota polis dan memerangi najis dadah menjadi azam pelatih terbaik keseluruhan program latihan asas kepolisan plak pelatih kadet sarjan siri 3 mohammad faiz had 27 mohammad faiz adalah seorang daripada 198 pelatih plak yang berjaya menamatkan latihan selepas sembilan bulan di maktab polis diraja malaysia pdrm kuala kubu bharu di sini menurut anak kelahiran alor setar itu pada awalnya dia tidak menyangka akan dipilih sebagai penerima anugerah itu kerana semua pelatih berpotensi dan hebat dua bulan pertama di sini saya pernah berasa putus asa kerana fizikal dan mental saya belum cukup kuat mana tidaknya mahu mengubah orang awam menjadi anggota polis bukan perkara mudah terutama bab disiplin itu belum termasuk latihan yang benarbenar menguji kekuatan fizikal situasi lebih parah apabila teringat anak dan isteri yang jauh katanya ketika ditemui selepas tamat program itu di sini semalam menurut bapa kepada seorang anak itu lagi keluarga dan rakan adalah sumber kekuatannya untuk terus bertahan sehingga tahap itu alhamdulillah dengan penganugerahan ini saya tidak kisah ditempatkan di manamana bahagian namun jika diberi peluang saya berharap boleh berkhidmat di bahagian siasatan jenayah narkotik katanya selepas tamat program itu bagi muhammad zulfikar asri 25 yang menerima anugerah pelatih terbaik latihan luar pula berkata penantiannya selama tiga tahun akhirnya berhasil menurut anak kelima daripada tujuh beradik itu sejak di bangku sekolah dia sudah bercitacita menjadi seorang anggota polis sejak kecil saya sudah didedahkan dengan dunia kepolisan kerana ayah sendiri seorang anggota polis saya menyaksikan bagaimana kesukaran ayah untuk bersama kami sekeluarga kerana masanya lebih banyak kepada orang awam demi keamanan negara pada awalnya ayah sendiri tidak bersetuju dan memberi galakkan kepada saya untuk menjadi anggota polis kerana risau saya tidak mampu menghadapinya katanya sebelum memasuki pdrm muhammad zulfikar pernah menyertai pasukan bomba selama dua tahun saya pernah menjadi anggota bomba kerana ketika itu belum mendapat panggilan daripada pdrm siapa sangka selepas dua tahun rezeki saya masih ada bersama pdrm dan akan gunakan peluang ini sebaik mungkin bagi memberi perkhidmatan terbaik kepada negara dan masyarakat katanya"
"kuala lumpur malaysia mengetuai rangkaian pusat operasi kecemasan eoc asean untuk berkongsi maklumat dan perkembangan jangkitan coronavirus 2019ncov susulan pengisytiharan virus itu sebagai darurat kesihatan awam global oleh pertubuhan kesihatan sedunia who ketua pengarah kesihatan datuk dr noor hisham abdullah berkata selain perkongsian maklumat dalam kalangan negara asean pusat itu berfungsi mempromosikan maklum balas dan komunikasi pengesanan awal bagi membendung penularan virus terbabit tindakan komunikasi risiko kebangsaan terkini adalah menyebarkan langkah kawalan dan pencegahan termasuk memerangi berita dan maklumat palsu yang tular di media sosial malaysia sudah menyediakan pelan tindak balas dalam membendung coronavirus sebelum beberapa kes awal dikesan di negara ini lebih penting malaysia sudah mengambil langkah awal sebelum who mengisytiharkan virus ini sebagai darurat kesihatan awam global katanya dalam satu kenyataan hari ini dr noor hisham berkata antara langkah pengesanan dan pencegahan diambil selain syor dikemukakan oleh who adalah dengan menjalankan ujian swab tekak terhadap individu yang berhubungan dengan kontak kes positif katanya ujian sampel itu dilakukan menerusi proses makmal dikenali sebagai pengesanan kontak malaysia sentiasa berjagajaga termasuk memperkasakan pemantauan di pintu masuk antarabangsa antaranya 54 menempatkan mesin pengesanan haba di 35 pintu masuk negara ini sebanyak 25 lagi mesin terbabit akan ditambah dan ditempatkan di lokasi strategik biarpun banyak bandar di china ditutup dan pembatalan penerbangan dari wuhan oleh airasia dan malindo setakat ini tiada keputusan dibuat kerajaan untuk menyekat semua penerbangan dari china ke malaysia katanya"

"kuala lumpur kerajaan berharap akan membentangkan rang undangundang pembiayaan politik dalam penggal ini untuk memantau kegiatan pembiayaan politik di dalam negara ini kata timbalan menteri di jabatan perdana menteri mohamed hanipa maidin bagaimanapun beliau berkata tiada kerangka masa dapat diberikan mengenai proses menggubal undangundang itu saya tidak mahu membuat spekulasi tetapi saya percaya kami akan membentangkannya dalam penggal ini sudah pasti kami perlu mendapat persetujuan perdana menteri bagaimanapun tun dr mahathir mohamad telah bersetuju dari segi prinsipnya saya tidak fikir ia akan menjadi satu masalah kata beliau pada sidang kemuncak antirasuah 2018 di sini pada selasa beliau berkata rang undangundang pembiayaan politik itu masih menunggu giliran kerana ada banyak lagi undangundang yang juga perlu diberi keutamaan saya diberitahu oleh peguam negara terdapat banyak undangundang untuk didraf jadi mereka perlu memberi keutamaan kepada undangundang yang penting dahulu tidak bermakna undangundang lain tidak penting tetapi kami perlu memberi keutamaan kepada undangundang yang perlu dipinda dan dimansuhkan katanya sidang kemuncak sehari bertemakan tadbir urus baik dan integriti untuk pertumbuhan mampan perniagaan dianjurkan oleh transperancy international malaysia tim ia dihadiri kirakira 500 peserta dan beberapa penceramah tempatan dan antarabangsa termasuk presiden tim datuk seri akhbar satar ketua pengarah jabatan imigresen datuk seri mustafar ali dan penasihat pencegahan rasuah unodcasia tenggara dan pasifik francesco checchi bernama"
"eksesais kerjasama pasifik 2019 antara angkatan tentera malaysia atm dan tentera laut amerika syarikat selama dua minggu bermula di kuching hari ini panglima angkatan bersama atm leftenan jeneral datuk suhaimi mohd zuki yang menyempurnakan majlis perasmiannya di pelabuhan pending hari ini berkata 150 pegawai dan anggota atm terbabit dalam eksesais kali ini yang kedua diadakan di kuching dan kali keempat di malaysia beliau berkata sepanjang tempoh dua minggu eksesais anggota terbabit akan melawat beberapa tempat bagi meninjau kerjasama dua hala antara atm dan tentera amerika syarikat di samping menjayakan latihan diplomasi pertahanan yang akan memberi fokus kepada kerjasama menghadapi kemungkinan bencana alam dan bantuan kemanusiaan katanya sebahagian besar pegawai dan anggota kali ini adalah dari bahagian perubatan memandangkan tumpuan latihan adalah perancangan dalam menghadapi bencana dan bantuan kemanusiaan latihan bersama seperti ini sangat berguna kerana jika berlaku bencana kita sudah ada perancangan dan cara bagaimana untuk menghadapinya katanya ditemui selepas majlis perasmian kapal usns fall river yang membawa lebih 100 pegawai dan anggota tentera amerika syarikat itu tiba di pelabuhan pending kuching dua hari lalu turut hadir pada majlis perasmian itu timbalan ketua misi kedutaan amerika syarikat di malaysia thompson dean dan komander misi kerjasama pasifik 2019 pp19 kapten randy van rossum thompson dan randy ketika ditemui masingmasing mengucapkan terima kasih kepada atm kerana memberi kerjasama yang sangat baik kepada pihaknya thompson berkata eksesais itu bertujuan membuat persediaan berhadapan dengan bencana mengukuhkan kerjasama tentera keduadua negara dan orang awam saling bertukar ilmu pengetahuan dan kepakaran serta memperkukuhkan keselamatan dan kestabilan rantau di samping mengukuhkan persahabatan merentas rantau indopasifik"
bernama20191130cfm disaran tingkat kerjasama dengan universiti anjur program kesedaran isu komunikasi multimediahttpwwwbernamacombmnewsphpid1795046 ketua bahagian korporat suruhanjaya komunikasi dan multimedia malaysia skmm datuk mohd ali hanafiah mohd yunus bergambar bersama para pemenang triple m explorace di universiti multimedia malaysia mmu cyberjaya 30 nov forum pengguna komunikasi dan multimedia malaysia cfm disaran meningkatkan kerjasama dengan institusi pengajian tinggi dalam menganjurkan programprogram kesedaran berkaitan isuisu perkhidmatan komunikasi dan multimedia kepada masyarakat ketua pegawai korporat suruhanjaya komunikasi dan multimedia malaysia skmm datuk mohd ali hanafiah mohd yunus berkata univerisiti khususnya yang menawarkan pengajian dalam bidang teknologi dan multimedia amat relevan untuk dijadikan platform kerana isu yang ingin dikongsi bersama masyarakat itu selari dengan apa yang ditawarkan institusi berkenaan beliau berkata cfm memerlukan pendekatan berbeza bagi membangkitkan kesedaran pengguna tentang hak dan isu perkhidmatan komunikasi dan multimedia berbading hanya tertumpu kepada penganjuran ceramah dan forum saya harap lebih banyak program seperti triple m explorace ini akan dianjurkan pada masa akan datang kerana ia merupakan pendekatan yang berbeza bagi pengguna mendapatkan maklumat mengenai industri katanya kepada pemberita selepas menutup acara triple m explorace di univerisiti multimedia malaysia mmu di sini hari ini hadir sama ialah pengerusi cfm mohana mohariff saya juga ingin melihat lebih banyak universiti menyokong inisiatif seperti ini untuk memastikan pengguna dimaklumkan dengan teknologi semasa dan hak mereka dalam industri telekomunikasi dan multimedia tambahnya triple m explorace merupakan program julung kali dianjurkan oleh cfm bersama malaysian technical standards forum bhd mtsfb membabitkan institusi pengajian tinggi mmu antara lain bertujuan menghubungkan antara forum dengan orang awam dan ahliahli industri bagi mempromosi peranan cfm dan mtsfb melalui aktiviti cabaran fizikal yang santai mohd ali hanafiah berkata program berbentuk kesedaran dan hak pengguna perlu diperbanyakkan seiring dengan perkembangan semasa teknologi komunikasi dan multimedia yang semakin komplek beliau berkata tahap kesedaran masyarakat mengenai hak selaku pengguna semakin baik berdasarkan kepada peningkatan bilangan aduan yang diterima skmm dan cfm ketika ini sementara itu mohana berkata program seperti triple m explorace yang bertujuan mendidik pengguna mengenai hakhak dalam industri telekomunikasi dan multimedia akan menjadi usaha berterusan cfm di masa akan datang program sinegri melibatkan pemain industri orang ramai dan institusi pengajian tinggi itu dilihat lebih efektif dalam berkongsi maklumat berkaitan hak pengguna serta badanbadan lain yang turut menjadi pemangkin perkembangan teknologi telekomunikasi di negara ini katanya cfm merupakan satu daripada empat forum di bawah skmm yang berperanan menggalakkan pembangunan industri komunikasi dan multimedia melindungi kepentingan pengguna serta menyediakan saluran untuk pengguna membuat aduan berkaitan perkhidmatan komunikasi dan multimedia bernama 8179sosioekonomimasyarakat

"dua lelaki termasuk seorang konstabel polis ditahan selepas dipercayai menyamun sekumpulan warga asing di rumah sewa mereka di taman sri sinar segambut kuala lumpur isnin lalu dalam kejadian kira kira pagi itu terdapat tiga lelaki warga myanmar berada di dalam rumah sewa berkenaan sumber berkata kedua dua suspek yang bersenjatakan pistol dan pisau masuk ke rumah berkenaan lalu mengikat mangsa seorang daripada suspek mengacu pistol dan memperkenalkan diri sebagai polis seorang lagi suspek bertindak menggeledah bilik mangsa sebelum melarikan dua telefon bimbit serta wang tunai berjumlah rm difahamkan ketiga tiga mangsa tidak mengalami sebarang kecederaan dan mereka membuat laporan di balai polis kepong berhubung kejadian itu katanya ketika dihubungi di sini hari ini katanya hasil maklumat diterima polis menahan kedua dua suspek berusia lingkungan an yang menaiki motosikal yamaha lc di tepi jalan dutamas seroja taman segambut di sini isnin lalu pemeriksaan terhadap suspek mendapati seorang daripada mereka adalah konstabel polis yang bertugas di ibu pejabat polis daerah ipd klang selatan manakala suspek kedua bekerja sebagai mekanik polis turut merampas pistol dan empat peluru dalam tangkapan itu katanya sementara itu ketua polis daerah sentul asisten komisioner r munusamy ketika dihubungi mengesahkan pihaknya menerima laporan berhubung kejadian itu namun tidak mengulas lanjut"
"jabatan imigresen malaysia jim mengadakan operasi secara besar besaran mulai tengah malam ini bagi memburu bukan sahaja pendatang asing tanpa izin pati malah majikan degil yang melindungi warga asing terbabit serta sindiket membawa masuk mereka tanpa menyediakan peluang pekerjaan ketua pengarah imigresen datuk seri mustafar ali berkata operasi dinamakan hari hari operasi atau hho itu diadakan di seluruh negara berikutan tamatnya tempoh program iaitu program serah diri warga asing dan pulang secara sukarela ke negara asal masing masing melalui program itu pati perlu membayar denda sebanyak rm serta rm lagi untuk pas khas bagi membolehkan mereka mendaftar dan pulang ke negara asal masing masing yang berakhir hari ini beliau berkata dari januari hingga ogos lalu seramai pati sudah mendaftar dan pulang ke negara masing masing dengan kebanyakannya dari indonesia dan bangladesh program diadakan sejak itu menyaksikan seramai pati menyertai program berkenaan dan sudah dihantar pulang secara sukarela kami tidak akan berkompromi dengan mereka sudah banyak masa diberikan untuk mendaftar dalam program ini imigresen akan melaksanakan penguatkuasaan secara agresif bagi memastikan sebanyak mungkin pati dihantar pulang manakala majikan yang degil pula akan diambil tindakan kami akan mengambil segala langkah perlu dan tindakan tegas bagi menangani isu berkaitan pati dan warga asing katanya pada sidang media selepas menghadiri perhimpunan bulanan bersama warga jim di putrajaya hari ini mustafar berkata semua pintu masuk negara akan diperketatkan kawalan keselamatan bagi mengurangkan risiko potensi pelawat asing berkenaan bertukar status menjadi pati apabila sudah berada di negara ini beliau berkata sepanjang tahun ini seramai pelawat asing ditolak kemasukan ntl ke negara ini kerana kedatangan mereka diragui"
"the judge had noted that the maximum punishment for wrongful restraint under section 341 of the penal code is only rm1000 or one months imprisonment reuters pickuching oct 31 eleven landowners who had pleaded not guilty to a joint charge of wrongfully restraining a quarry personnel at a blockade site saw their bail reduced from rm4000 to rm500 each by the sibu high court today their counsel simon siah said judge lim hock leng reduced the amount after hearing the application for review of the bail imposed by the mukah magistrates court yesterday he said deputy public prosecutor muhammad zulfadli mohd nawawi did not object to the application the judge agreed that the bail imposed by the magistrate on the accused was excessive and defeated the purpose of the bail siah told malay mail mmstorymreg2 he said the judge noted that the maximum punishment for wrongful restraint under section 341 of the penal code is only rm1000 or one months imprisonment the 11 are donald heagen anak jimmy edwin lian anak baong tan anak kayong tangai anak jinang liew joon chen james anak rundi mancha anak abok lawrence anak ngadi andin aanak ah kow darren anak hilary and lulong anak bujah the magistrate had ordered them to post bail of rm4000 each with two sureties whose monthly income must be rm1500 each after they pleaded not guilty to the joint charge of wrongfully restraining stephen wong yaw teck at about 940am on october 8 they were arrested on october 25 and charged in the mukah magistrates court yesterday siah wrote a letter to the registrar of the sibu high court yesterday requesting a review of the rm4000 bail saying that the accused were merely general workers and farmers with little to no income he added that it would also be difficult for the landowners to get sureties earning rm1500 a month each siah also said the villagers of several longhouses had erected the blockade in an attempt to engage the quarry company in a dialogue over the destruction of their land and rivers"
hmetro20190902hijrah bawa kejayaanhttpswwwhmetrocommymutakhir201909492093hijrahbawakejayaan sejarah menunjukkan individu yang berani berhijrah mampu mencapai kejayaan sehingga ada kalanya ke tahap luar biasa mufti wilayah persekutuan datuk seri dr zulkifli mohamad albakri berkata sahabat nabi yang melakukan hijrah ke madinah selepas beberapa ketika mereka cukup kaya dan hebat beliau turut mengaitkan dengan beberapa nama dekat dalam masyarakat seperti pemain bola sepak profesional dari mesir mohamed salah yang pada awalnya menyertai el mokawloon dari 2010 hingga 2012 salah kemudian bermain untuk basel hingga 2014 dan menjaringkan sembilan gol dalam 47 perlawanan kemudian salah bermain untuk chelsea dan dipinjamkan ke fiorentina serta roma sebelum mengambil keputusan menyertai roma sepenuhnya pada 2017 dia memutuskan untuk berpindah ke liverpool yang akhirnya menyaksikan jaringan gol paling banyak disumbang olehnya dia memenangi pelbagai anugerah antaranya pemain lelaki fifa terbaik 2018 nilai salah ketika berpindah dari as roma ke liverpool ketika itu hanya 40 juta euro rm18992 juta namun kini nilai salah melonjak sehingga dianggarkan mencapai 150 juta euro katanya menerusi siri terbaru bayan linnas bertajuk hijrah itu membawa kejayaan nama lain termasuk arnold schwarzenegger dari austria ke amerika syarikat dengan kekayaan dianggarkan hingga tahun ini kirakira as400 juta dan jack ma yang nilai kekayaannya mencecah as381 bilion selain itu katanya ahmad dawjee dadhaboy iaitu ahli perniagaan dermawan berasal dari gujerat india yang memilih untuk menetap di kuala lumpur sebelum meninggal pada 1987 dengan penampilan serta gaya hidup yang sederhana kediaman beliau sehingga akhir hayat hanyalah sebuah flat di jalan masjid india yang dipenuhi kitab serta majalah tiada siapa tahu warga tua yang sering kelihatan di warung adalah seorang dermawan katanya menurutnya pada penghujung usia allahyarham mewakafkan hampir keseluruhan hartanya termasuk sebidang tanah seluas 12 hektar di jalan perak kuala lumpur kesudian allahyarham untuk mewakafkan hartanah di tapak yang begitu tinggi nilainya ini membolehkan ia dimajukan dan akhirnya memberi pulangan besar kepada umat islam nilai tanah itu sebelum dibangunkan adalah rm34 juta dan selepas dibangunkan nilainya melonjak kepada lebih rm151 juta katanya297sosioekonomimasyarakat
